Review: These are my first real pair of crocs.  Never had the need for them as I don't work in health care.  I do however run my own printing business of which I am on my feet most of the day and with my sicatic nerve issues, I was looking for something comfortable.  These did the job!  I even have arch support which is crazy!  Will be buying another pair soon.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020

Title: Know Your Size
Review: Update: a week later I definitely just need to wear them for a little while and they are perfect definitely the best pair for the priceThese are my first pair of crocs so I was not sure what to expect as far as sizes for. I have been told that they run smaller or true to size, so I just went with my normal size which is US Women 8. They are a bit small length wise maybe I just need to break them in or I possibly just have too fat of a foot. Bright side they are comfy and true in color
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2020

Title: Best Gardening shoes ever
Review: Let's be honest, these things are hideous, even though they are the cutest shade of pink ever. I only wear them when gardening (in the Texas heat). They are easy to slip on, clean, and are sturdy enough to go trekking around in the grass. Very supportive, and have had zero complaints so far. I hose them off at the end of my gardening sessions and store them in the garage.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020

Title: YOU CAN FEEL IT IN YOUR SOLE!
Review: The Croslite Polymer rubber-like material is extremely soothing to your feet. I use these as slippers indoors. They keep your feet cool in the summer and warm in the winter. As soon as I walk in the door, I step into these. These shoes RELAX your feet big time! You can wear the strap in the front or the back. I wear it in the back to secure my heel. You can also use them at the beach to protect your feet from glass, rocks, & sea weed. These Crocs are the first item I put in my suitcase no matter where I'm going. You can throw them in the washing machine and they quickly air dry. You can also hose them off. They are my 2nd feet! I wear them all the time I am inside my house (except when I'm sleeping) because they feel so comfortable. These Crocs last for years! The value greatly exceeds the price and you will save hundreds of dollars on slippers if you use them in their place. I highly recommend them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020

Title: So comfy
Review: I LOVE my crocs! It’s been hard to wear other shoes lately haha I find myself just wanting to throw these on every time I leave the house! I’ve had these for a couple months now and they have held up great for me! I saw a lot of reviews say the quality isn’t as great as it once was but I was satisfied with the product I received! Just ordered a pair in a different color!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020

Title: Cute and super comfy
Review: For me these fit great and are super comfortable. I have very wide feet. I wear an 8.5 4E and have so much trouble finding shoes that fit but these are just right let alone that come in so many cute colors. I have moderate arch and these provide great support. I have worn them walking and on bike rides and my feet have been very happy.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

Title: Comfortable and protects my feet from our killer attack kitten.
Review: Bought these to protect my feet from the killer attack kitten we recently adopted. I forgot how comfortable Crocs are and I’ve been enjoying wearing them around the house. I do have a medical issue that causes my feet to swell so these shoes do accommodate for the swelling. I love the color and have been enjoying rockin the Crocs again!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020

Title: Good quality!  Good Price!
Review: My daughter plays high school softball and these are the go to shoes for after and before games. They do not come in half sizes as my daughter wears size 7 1/2 shoes, but just order up and it will fit. These are well made and durable to sports. Great price too!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019

Title: CROCS !!! Is the hype true ?!?!
Review: Fits well, first time Crocs owner so will try to do an update in a month or so after they are broken in. After reading the reviews I was hoping for American made but got "Made in Vietnam". Other sites said that's a good thing, we shall see. So far they fit perfect, a little room for the big toe and both my feet are surprisingly comfortable being they just came out of the bag. Feels like a slipper and the motion of my feet react just like they do with slides, however when I pull the Crocs strap back, both feet are snug and grip the ground firmly much more than I anticipated. Will test on wet floors, beach, hot tar, and concrete. Any other tests anyone wants done let me know and maybe I'll experiment with them. I'll do an update review in a month or sooner if they wind up being my summer go to shoe. Giving 5 starts because so far everything promised was given from quick delivery to a proper fit. Will change if things don't work out, but for now Crocs is living up to the hype.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019

Title: My feet thank whoever designed Crocs!
Review: I have wide feet that spread out at the toe.  Therefore, Croc's roomy toe area is just perfect for me.  They are VERY comfortable and I would recommend them to anyone.  If you get a pair you'll be doing yourself a favor.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020

Title: All I wear now. If you think they're ugly, give them a chance!
Review: Thoroughly impressed with these. I didn't have a strong opinion of these before I purchased (most people think ugly). I was looking for something to wear anywhere and everywhere, which these are fantastic for. They stay on my feet and don't flop around, slide on easily, lightweight, comfortable, breathable, easy to clean, the list goes on and on! Also worth mentioning, I suffer from Lupus and wake up in the morning stiff as a board. These make my mornings so much easier not having to bend down and fuss with putting shoes/slippers on. As far as the aesthetics of these, doesn't bother me at all! The benefits far outweigh the appearance of these so just give them a chance.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020

Title: Approved!
Review: I used to have the Baya Clogs and those were definitely more wide and sort of more comfortable for lounging around. These regular clogs are great if you’re gonna do some walking. They are more slim so if you have a more narrow foot get these but if you have a more wider foot I would say get the Baya clog. Overall great quality :) just don’t leave them out in the sun because they WILL shrink, learned my lesson haha.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020

Title: Ugly shoe that I had sworn not to wear but bought and now wear anyway!
Review: Our adult son showed my husband his Crocs and then he tried them on.  My husband then bought them and loves them.  Then I had to go outside to get the mail and I didn't want to go back into my closet so I wore my husband's Crocs out to the mail box.  Oh my gosh, they were comfy for these flat feet, so now I own 2 pair.  This one and the winter ones that have fuzzy material inside them.  I wear them with socks on so that the soles don't smell and will keep longer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020

Title: These are awesome!
Review: These are a must-have for me.  After my husband threw my old ones in the dryer ( I wash them with the rags), they shrunk too much to be able to wear them.  I had to order another pair right away as I love these for slippers after being on ladders all day.  The cushioning is just glorious and makes my feet feel so much better.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019

Title: Better Than Expected
Review: I was hesitant to buy these for a couple of reasons.  First, they're...you know--rubber? Plastic? Something like that...  Second, they're...you know--not masculine? Kind of sissified? Finally, the picture makes them look flimsy. So okay. Yes--they are some kind of man-made rubber/plastic/neoprene/something, but that makes them waterproof meaning you can leave them out on the deck after you've been working in the yard and you don't have to worry about them getting soggy and ruined. No--they're not the most masculine shoes I've ever seen, so you have to be pretty confident in your manhood if you wear them out on the town but I got them for yard work which is a fairly macho enterprise. And no, they're not as flimsy as the pictures look. I don't know how long that heel-strap thing will last, but I don't use it half the time anyway and for some reason, your feet don't slip out of the shoes without it, so if it does break--Super Glue and duct tape. THEN they'll look masculine!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2013

Title: Great Product
Review: Great fit and so comfortable! I was having a problem with pain in my heel and these shoes was the perfect remedy. I will be ordering more in several different colors.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020

Title: Very comfortable.
Review: I bought the USA women's size 8. Normally I wear an 8 1/2 shoe. This clog fits snug but not too tight. I like that the back strap can be worn over your heel or flipped up to the front out of the way. This does have little knobby things inside but I wear low ankle socks with mine so I don't feel them. The soles are very cushiony and have good tread so I don't slip on uneven ground. Very pleased.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2019

Title: Like a Foot Massage Every Time I wear Them
Review: I purchased these to wear around the house because I have been having lot's of heel pain and can't walk barefoot anymore.  These shoes are a life saver.  I never owned Crocs before.  My son purchased a pair with the fussy liners and he really liked them.  I didn't want the extra warmth so I purchased these.  I am so impressed.  And I can go outside in them if I want.  Part of the reason for my headline about "foot massage", is the soles have small ridges of dots that actually massage my foot.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2019

Title: Got flat feet??? WEAR CROCS!!!!!!!!
Review: I love my classic crocs, I have VERY flat feet and am troubled by foot pain, these shoes are the ONLY kind I have been able to wear for a long time now.  I have at least 10 pair of them in several different colors, they may not have always been the most “Fashionable” shoes to wear but I’m still able to keep going because of them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020

Title: Don’t tell the homies I Croc.
Review: Well well well... look who’s reviewing a purchase of Crocs. I’ve been a lifelong hater of crocs, it’s true. But as I’ve gotten older I’ve seen the time and place for them (newsflash it’s not everywhere). Power washing patio: yup. Walking out to the garage/yard to do some stuff: yup. Basement: uh-huh. Welding/grinding: negatory. Leaving the house to go into public: still a big nope... for now.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020

Title: Make sure you look at the color!
Review: Great crocs. Just not the yellow I was expecting. I ordered the citrus yellow thinking it was the lemon yellow but it was my own fault so I’m still giving a 5 star because they look fantastic . Anyways, easy fix - sold them to my sister LOL
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020

Title: Love them
Review: Brought this my daughter, she love crocs wear them all year no matter how cold, or hot it is outside. So they must be very comfortable.  She was missing a few colors so we got the colors she didn't have, and she love them. Great prices as well, she wear them enough so for that price I get as many as I can .
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020

Title: The website is nice and there are all kinds of options
Review: I used to have heel pain --  plantar fascia.  I stretched a couple times a day and that mostly kept the pain at bay.  Then a friend suggested crocs.  Pain gone.  It has been 10 years since I have worn anything else -- or stretched.  I used to these shoes direct from Crocs.  The website is nice and there are all kinds of options.  Almost all of the styles that I tried were narrower.  My 'real shoe' size is 11 EEE.  Crocs Mens 12 work in this style.  If they feel a little tight at first, keep wearing them.  They stretch and, like fine leather shoes, mold to the feet.  Amazon Prime means free shipping, so I can buy one pair at a time without paying shipping and for the same price as the Crocs website or the local box store.And if you take a worn out pair and slice them up, they make fine sanding blocks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2016

Title: Why are they so comfortable?
Review: You know you've gone full adult when crocs are super comfortable and you wear them around the house.  Normal cruise mode is great, I haven't flipped the ankle strap back yet for sport mode but I'm sure it works flawless. 100/10, would croc again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020

Title: The perfect gardening shoes for plantar fasciitis inserts
Review: These are exactly what I needed them to be. Comfortable,  waterproof, easy on/off shoes for me to wear when doing yard work. If they were a half size larger I would say they're perfection. Other than that, these are wonderful.  I need to always wear shoes or inserts for plantar fasciitis,  and the heel bed in these shoes is deep enough for me to slip some right in and they stay in place. I've now tossed out my old tennis shoes I was wearing for garden work.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2019

Title: Like that they haven’t changed a thing in the design
Review: Bought this pair to replace the ones my dad has had for 8 years and they are exactly the same as far as fit, design and comfort. He has wide feet and this style fits him perfectly. I’m glad to see that this design has stayed the same over the years. I tried his on and didn’t realize how much better these (comfort and tread) were vs my slippers for around the house. Needless to say, I’ll be purchasing my own.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020

Title: Great for support when quarantined!
Review: After a month of mandatory COVID work from home my lower back would kill at the end of the day from not wearing shoes all day. I hate wearing shoes when I’m home but needed support for my back. These did the trick. They are loose so you don’t feel like you have shoes on but give my lower back the support it needs. Got a fun color cus heck I’m in quarantine. Why not?!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020

Title: Crocs is the best. Period
Review: I have purchased Crocs for a long time.I have 4 pairs at home.These are great slippers and this one is as good as anything I have had in the past.The quality of Crocs slippers is amazing. These really help you if you have a habbit of hitting your toes in walls, doors and bed bottoms.Crocs is the best. Period
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020

Title: Good traction
Review: They provide reasonable support and are slip proof.  The size 7 I usually wear is slightly snug with these; I would be happier with a 7.5 if they had half sizes.  The holes are nice because they let your feet breath.  I wear socks with them because the inside feels slightly prickly (little nubs).  (Note:  I edited my review and gave it a higher rating after a few days because they are very different and take some getting used to.  For standing and doing chores, they are pretty comfortable).
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019

Title: Just what my daughter wanted !
Review: My daughters volleyball team wanted matching crocs for the upcoming season. She wears a size 9.5 so we originally ordered a 10, but after trying them on we sent them back and went with the 9 which fit much better. She is very happy with them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020

Title: Crocs Exceeded My Expectations
Review: I was the type of person that believed Crocs were very uncomfortable, so I never bought a pair of Crocs. However, a friend of mine owns about 7 pairs of Crocs and swears they are the most comfortable pairs of shoes. I tried on one of hers, and they were extremely comfortable, so I bought a pair of my own. I am very impressed with the price, comfort, and ease of these shoes. They are perfect for slipping on and going, and if they get dirty from being outside, they wipe clean very easily.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020

Title: Comfortable and easy to wear.
Review: I made fun of my daughters white crocs SO MUCH until I put hers on jokingly and was like WHOA WAYAMINUTE. They are so comfortable. I bought mine in black so that I can wear them at work. Only one of my coworkers has made fun of me so I'd say its a WIN WIN! I am a total old lady tho and I keep the backs on mine. My daughter calls that "sport mode". Keep your crocs in sport mode for easier wear.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019

Title: Comfy!
Review: I really like these for my yard work. They have good support and are comfortable to wear for the day. I did go for a 3 mile walk in them and it gave me little blisters on the top of my foot as crocs are not designed to be form fitting and so they rubbed a bit...so I would just wear socks with them if I plan on walking a long time in them. I really like them regardless.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020

Title: Bigfoot likes um!
Review: Well... I never had a pair of Crocs before. Somebody told me they used to be softer. I like the Crocs a lot. They are a tad wide but I expected that. They are my new go to shoes this Summer. I have a size 15 foot. I was just amazed that I could get them in a size-15 for $30. I bought my daughter a pair and they were $10 more for the same basic style. .. Go figure? Glad I got them. They will be a great Summer/house shoes for me. Flip flops are not made for guys with a size 15 foot. These crocs have got to be the next best thing to flip flops..... maybe better.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2018

Title: So comfy!!!
Review: These are the most comfortable ugly shoes I've ever had! I have high arches and find it so hard to find a comfortable shoe with enough support. These I can wear all day long and I don't feel like I need to put more comfortable shoes on. I love them! Ment to get the black but accidentally ordered navy blue. That's ok, should go good with my hean shorts.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020

Title: Ugly, but comfy
Review: For the longest time, ever since they came out really, I thought Crocs were the ugliest shoes. I couldn't see why anybody wore them. However, my boyfriend owns a pair, and I had to wear them a few times (granted his feet are quite bigger than mine). They. Are. Comfortable. As. Heck. It took a while, but I finally decided that I needed to buy a pair of my own. My feet hurt all the time, especially my heels because that's where I put all of my weight when standing. Let me tell you: I can walk around for hours wearing these shoes, and I don't feel any discomfort. Even after a 9-hour shift of standing and walking around at work, I can put these on, and my feet already feel better. Do yourself a favor and buy yourself a pair. I wear 8 1/2, so I dropped down a half size as recommended, and they fit perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2018

Title: I LOVE Crocs 💛💛
Review: At first I had an issue with actually getting my item which worried me a little bit because it was supposed to be here and then it wasn’t but they ended up sending me another pair so that was wonderful. I love crocs I have a few different colors and pairs of them already, they are very comfortable true to size with them and color. I think they are great for multiple reasons and purposes. Definitely buy some.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020

Title: Good versatile shoe around the house
Review: I'm using these for my indoor slippers and they are great!  Supportive, comfortable, breathable and not slippery on our kitchen floor.  They are easy to clean and the little grips on the inside are not bothersome at all.  The fit was true to size. When a product like checks all the boxes I consider it a great value!  Love the color as well!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020

Title: Keep wearing it to loosen over time
Review: I love these clogs!!! I still have my old pair since 2004! I bought a new pair just in case my old pair might fail.I was reading some of the reviews here stating that the clog is a tight fit. It's only tight because it hasn't been worn and it's brand new. Once you keep wearing it, it'll loosen over time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020

Title: My Third Pair!
Review: I wear a size 9 1/2 in women’s ordered a 10 in the Navy and they are perfect. These are my third pair along with the Croc sandals. All of my crocs says they were made in Vietnam if that helps anyone.  I have flat feet (fallen arch) and scoliosis (curvy spine), Crocs help with my back and hip pain. I got Prime so they were delivered the next day.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020

Title: Great!
Review: Got it for a friend of mine. She loves the color and the fit was all right. She did tell me that sometimes her toes would occasionally touch/hit the toe part of the crocs, but if she goes to a size higher, it would be too big for her. She doesn't mind it too much though! The price is good for the fact that crocs are $50+.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2020

Title: Great prouduct
Review: Pros-  Good in the water. really comfortable, no pain in your foot, you can decorate themCons- A little roomy, I personally don't think its a problem but some people don't like that. it sticks to your feet if they get sweatyIn conclusion, great water shoes for the beach or good shoes for chilling around at home. 100% recommend for anyone looking for a multifunctional pair of shoes that they can decorate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020

Title: Can't live without them!
Review: I had a pair of these that I had worn almost every day for 6+ years that somehow got lost during a hospital stay.  I was so sad ... and immobilized, as these shoes are what I wear around my house every day while I chase my kiddos and do chores!  If I don't wear them my feet hurt so badly.  After a week or so of going barefoot and not wearing them I ended up with a full limp and a sore knee (from walking funny because of my foot pain).  My husband couldn't stand it anymore and told me to order another pair PRONTO!  I did, and within a day my feet felt great again!  I have incredibly high arches, and these are one of the few types of shoes I can wear for extended periods of time without any pain.  I loooove my crocs!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2016

Title: 4x4 Capable - Comfortable Design
Review: Very comfortable footwear that is perfect to have by the back door of you go in and out of the house frequently. They feel good on the bottom of your feet because of the bumpy pattern of the shoe that contacts your sole. They stay on great, and if you need more security you can flip over the strap and put them in four wheel drive mode. I typically wear a 13, or sometimes a 12 1/2 of a shoe manufacturer even makes it, but in these I wear a 12. If your feet sweat, you might find they sweat more in these. However, my feet seem to be getting use to them and seem to be sweating less the more that I wear them. They are a great product, designed well, and seem robust enough to last for years. I would definitely recommend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020

Title: Love them
Review: I always thought crocs were goofy. But I'm the kind of person whose feet feel better if I wear shoes in the house, especially if I'm standing in my kitchen cooking for long periods of time, or doing other chores around the house. These are excellent for that. So comfortable and cushy. Love the purple color too.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020

Title: I would buy another pair
Review: Brought these to slip on if I need to run errands quick and for the summer to wear when I go on a boat or to the beach. These are perfect for all of those things. You won’t be disappointed. Even though I would have liked if these came in half sizes due to the fact that when you put the strap on in the back, your foot is pushed literally to the top of the shoe which to me isn’t uncomfortable, but I know for some individuals it may be. I also like a little bit of a looser fit. But other than that, I couldn’t be happier with this buy!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2020

Title: Crocs are wide and fit well. They are true to size, though, and last forever
Review: Living on an island just 60 feet from the water, my everyday shoes are flip flops and Crocs!  My feet are wide, so Crocs are perfect. I bought blue and also red, but they offered multiple, unusual colors. Plus they were on sale. Crocs are also perfect to use in any body of water, especially the ocean.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020

Title: Great house shoes!
Review: I had a pair of these in middle school and didn’t appreciate them as much as I do now! I bought a pair in the gorgeous Ice Blue color in size 8. My shoe size ranges from 7 to 8, so the 8 is perfect. My feet hurt when I walk around barefoot in the apartment since we have hard floors, but wearing these has alleviated the pain of weekend chores!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019

Title: Color is as shown
Review: Hello,The size is accurate and the color is a bright pink.  The shoes arrived on the date indicated and are so cute on!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020

Title: They make great house shoes, not work shoes
Review: Bought these because I work in a warehouse and my feet have been bothering me. Many people recommend Crocs. Unfortunately I don't enjoy working in them, I do not find them comfortable for standing and walking all day.I do find them comfortable for house shoes though. I do find them comfy wearing them on and off throught the day. I do like these and would recommend, but not for what I intended.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020

Title: Great buy!
Review: If you are in between sizes, size down. I am a women’s 9.5 and I have wide feet. I originally bought the size 10 women and they are really wide and I trip over them constantly. I bought the 9 and while they felt snug at first as soon I walked around they fit much better. Beautiful color. Also look out for the coupons!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2020

Title: Fourth or fifth pair.
Review: Nothing says relaxing at the house like a good pair of crocs. I would not suggest pairing them with a suit and tie but for passive walks through Walmart and Dollar General they cannot be beat. Easy to clean with a water hose. Haven’t had to put these bad boys in 4x4 yet but I have no doubt they will perform as their predecessors have.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020

Title: Happy Convert
Review: Finally gave in, and I love them -- I have resisted crocs for many years, because they look, to be brutal, stupid.  But we spend the winter on the beach, and I got tired of ruining at least two pairs of white sandals a year by getting them wet when I was totally sure I wouldn't.  So: crocs.  The reviews left me frightened of mis-sizing, so I shot an arrow in the air and ordered an eight, which fits perfectly.  They are comfortable on the beach, comfortable around the house, and comfortable when we go out on errands.  Mine are white, and they have stayed dazzlingly clean looking.  On the downside, they do accumulate debris, and the do look -- stupid.  But noone is asking me to wear them on Madison Avenue, and for a beach community, they are just great.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2015

Title: Great gift for middle school boys & girls.
Review: I really don’t understand why these out of all of the things us 90s teens wore have came back into popularity with vsco teens but besides that they fit the kid well & she says that they are comfortable. They run a little big but she’ll be wearing them with fuzzy socks 🤷🏼‍♀️ & they fit fine with those on. I wish they weren’t made in China b/c I believe they used to made in the USA.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019

Title: Comfortable house slippers
Review: I love to wear these in the house. They are extremely comfortable, and the lavender color that I got is super cute. I don’t think they’re as ugly as people say, but that is just my opinion.I don’t wear them outside though, because they do not give me adequate high arch support. So these are just my leisure slippers.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020

Title: Ordered for my elderly father with swollen feet
Review: I ordered this pair of crocs for my 80 year older father as a safer and more supportive option to slippers for those days that his feet are swollen.My father's legs and feet swell, so he tends to wear open back slippers because of the ease of putting them on when his feet swell, however, there is no support and they are a fall risk since they can easily fall off his feet.  The crocs on the other hand are a roomy, solid option for when his feet swell and the air holes help to keep his feet cool, unlike shoes. The back strap keeps them on his feet, thus keeping him safer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020

Title: Huge Khaki Croc Men' 7/Women's 9 more like Women's 10  Wear socks!
Review: This Croc's sold by Croc not Crocs khaki Men's7/Women's 9 is huge!  They are -much- larger than the Men's7/Women's 9 live leaf Crocs I bought at crocsdotcom. I'm keeping them because I like the color and I'll just wear socks to take up room. I don't understand how the same brand, same size can be so different!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020

Title: I’ve converted to the Croc
Review: I will preface this by saying that I have always made fun of Crocs—they’re such ugly shoes. My opinion on this has not changed, although I have grown to appreciate the rubber aesthetic because holy heck, are they comfortable. Seriously, SO comfortable. I’ve been converted. Catch me with my traffic cone aesthetic shoes, yeah?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020

Title: Strap down, Size up!!!
Review: These are of course super comfortable but beware the strap (see picture) makes them about a size smaller than my normal croc size. For some reason with the white crocs the strap comes in almost a whole inch from the back of the shoe. So if you rock socks and crocs and/or like the strap down to lock in the shoe, your toe will rub in the front if you get your normal size. Which I found uncomfortable. Thankfully Amazon has great returns and I was able to get the best fitting size. Normal size men’s 11 I went up to men’s 12 and fit great.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020

Title: Pure comfort
Review: Fit perfectly, I'm really impressed with the comfort level. I was tired of wearing out slippers and my feet were killing me, so I Googled top rated comfort shoes and these kept popping up. I can say I completely agree!! I definitely will buy more for outdoor use as well. I love the custom buttons too!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2020

Title: Baseball Croc Wearing Teenager!
Review: I have 3 boys (Ages from 19 to 15 yrs old) they all have a pair. This exact pair I bought for my younger, Boy who uses them for travel from the car to the dugout before and after his Baseball games . At this point in time one of the shoes has already broke at the part where the "Sports Mode" ...( The back ,heal strap)  attaches to the top part of the shoe.. so with that ... they can't be used like that anymore. But otherwise all is good 👍
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020

Title: Extremely comfortable! Good Purchase! Happy Feet
Review: I love these shoes. I bought them for work. I work 12+ hours a shift and these shoes keep my feet happy. The width is perfect! No more toe pain. The toe box has plenty of room. I usually wear a 7.5-8 In sneakers so I ordered the 8 in these shoes. As long as I don’t wear them with the strap around my ankle they are a perfect fit. With the strap, my big toes are right up against the top. If I ordered again, I might consider a 9 so I can wear them with straps.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020

Title: SO comfy!
Review: I'm a converted Croc hater! My son and his wife got some a few years back to wear out and about on their property and so I thought I'd give them a try - wow - was I surprised at how wonderfully comfy they are!  I'm on my second pair now and still loving them.  I'm a size 9 and these fit true to size for me.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

Title: If you want happy feet Crocs are the answer!
Review: This is my third pair of Crocs because they are crazy comfortable.  I suffer with metatarsalgia capsulitis and if you know that name you know how painful it is.  I can no longer walk bare footed and  I was upset about this until I was reintroduced to Crocs which make this much less of a hardship.  I have convinced my family to try them and they were instantly hooked.  If you care about foot comfort, I cannot recommend them highly enough.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2019

Title: Very happy with the color
Review: Usually I buy crocs in black and use them as house/garden shoes. Decided to spend a bit more and get them in lavender. They don't heat up as much in the sun as black ones, which is very nice, but also look very pretty. Don't expect a lot of support for your feet, but if you need shoes that you can just hose off, these are great. Will buy them again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2020

Title: nursing
Review: i bought these for my job ( nursing assistant at a nursing home) and these were the best decision. i wanted something i could easily hose down if i got urine, feces, or food on and something that was comfortable for an 8+ hour shift for standing. i love these so much that i wear them even when i’m not working. if your facility doesn’t allow crocs with holes, look into the specialist or the bistro crocs
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2020

Title: Worked well on military deployment. Durable and comfortable
Review: I wore these at least once a day for 9 months on my last military deployment. I highly recommend them if you need "shower shoes." I wore these in the shower, in my berthing, and even walking through the Kuwaiti desert to get to the bathroom. They've been folded, smushed, and packed multiple times in my pack and they don't seem to show any signs of breaking. One thing a lot of people might not realize is that they're thicker than regular flip flops and will protect your feet from bacteria better. I seriously think everyone should use these instead of those cheap, black $1 flip flops you get at the PX. I wear a size 11 in most footwear, but these were maybe a half size too big. I didn't really mind this because they were easy to slip on and off.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2014

Title: True to size and wide enough!
Review: This is my first pair of crocs. I heard they have arch support which is exactly what I need. It’s winter now, so I can only use them in the house. But they seem to be fairly comfortable and true to your normal shoe size. I was skeptical bc I have very wide feet, but they fit pretty good. They won’t be my daily shoe choice, but I look forward to putting them to use! Vibrant colors also!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019

Title: Back savers
Review: After hurting my back a few years ago, the permanent nerve damage in my leg has left me unable to wear a lot of footwear that I used to love.  I ended up trying a pair of Crocs and they were life savers.  They are so comfortable and cause no discomfort.  I can walk all day in these.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020

Title: Crocs!
Review: I've been wearing my crocs around the house (but never out to clubs) for years, and the last pair just wouldn't wear out! I did need something with tread on the bottom.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020

Title: Why didn't I buy these years ago?!
Review: Okay so I always swore I would never wear such a hideous looking shoe. After I bought these to wear primarily around the house when I have to let my dogs in or out, I realized they are THEE MOST COMFORTABLE shoe! I mean I still wouldn't wear them in public and my family judges me for wearing them even around the house, but WOW these are seriously amazing!! (still ugly though!)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019

Title: Purple nurse shoes
Review: Good color (see purple comparison).  I bought these for work and so far I love them. I wore crocs when I was in nursing school 13 years ago and swore them off as clown shoes, but honestly, they are super comfy especially with thick winter socks.I typically wear a 7.5-8 in shoes.  I got an 8 and they are a little large bur that's the style.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020

Title: Great shoes
Review: We had to return it and order a size larger, but other than that, these were great. Got them for my sister for her graduation, and she's been wearing them all the time since. Apparently these are very comfortable shoes and they fit very well and are great for walking in the summer and for wearing into water
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020

Title: Love these Shoes!
Review: I've never purchased Crocs before, but I needed something comfortable to wear in the house.  These are fabulous!  They have some cushion to them, fit well (I ordered size 9 because I'm an 8.5), and once broken in they mold to your feet which makes them almost perfect.  And the color is awesome.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020

Title: Great fit and price
Review: Bought these for my husband who had a non name pair of imitations. Sadly our puppy had gotten a hold of them twice so extra holes were added. In addition they had been worn through on the soles.The first moment he put them on he was so happy. The crocs actually fit extremely well no looseness although I had ordered a size 11 and he normally wears a 10.5. There are bumps\ridges on the inside that massaged his feet.He took the dog on their usual walk 2 miles wearing the crocs.When he returned the shoes had become his new favorite shoe instead of hiking boots or anything else.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2016

Title: Good buy
Review: Fits true to size. Nice light pink color, I love them! Glad I found them here, they’re cheaper than buying from the Croc store, so definitely a good deal. I’d recommend to anyone looking for a light, comfortable pair of shoes. I’ve had mine for over a year now and they are still in good condition, very easy to clean.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020

Title: what have i been doing for the past 25 years?
Review: locked up in quarantine and thinking about what could get me through the next 2 months. my wife and kids are wearing me out, im not smart enough to homeschool my daughter, and i vacillate between hopeless despair and crippling apathy.but since getting these crocs im a new man - a dad reborn. the titallating spikes keep me on my toes, the sport-mode heal flap allows me to relax and chase my kids without having to swap shoes, and the overall comfort keeps me sane during the dumpster fire that is america's handling of COVID-19.11/10 recommend and will likely be purchasing all colors and accompanying jibbitz before my wife is allowed to leave the house to find a lawyer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020

Title: You ain’t rockin unless you’re..
Review: What can I say...crocs are life. I’ve ordered 3 pairs of size 8s off of Amazon so far and these and one other pair are smaller than the first pair I bought. They were made in different countries though so I’m pretty sure that has something to do with it. These still fit fine they’re just a tighter fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020

Title: Comfy
Review: Shopping for shoes can be hard because I fit anywhere between 9/10. I bought the nines and I’m happy I did. They could be a tad bigger but if I got the 10 I’m sure they would have been too big. They’re wide so a 10 would have made them slip right off with every step. True to color and comfy for work
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020

Title: Go for a Loose Fit
Review: Liked the free return-The first pair was a size too small, the Clogs I ordered as a replacement fit perfectly. A comfortable size for me turned out to be 1/2 size larger than the fit I like for a shoe. When first wearing I thought the loose fit would be a problem with the Clogs slipping off as the back strap is not adjustable but due to good design by Crocs the Clogs are completely secure and do not slip off. My advice is to go for the loose fit as it makes for a very comfortable fit.wd
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2018

Title: Love my crocs
Review: I bought a pair for work and purposely needed up buying a size bigger so I could use the strap on the back. The size 8 fit great without using the strap but while working and moving around the strap is beneficial so I got a 9. A little big but for my needs. They are easy to clean!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020

Title: Great Camp Shoes
Review: I use the Crocs as camp shoes on my hiking trips. They provide protection for my toes when walking around camp and for water crossings.  I wear a Woman's 8.5 shoe but this size (Women's 8 M/Men's 6M) works for me. They are a bit large around the toe box but is doable. I do like the movable strap which a nice option.  These are light weight compared to the other shoes I have tried.  They weigh around 10 ounces.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019

Title: Must-have for swimmers 🏊🏻‍♀️
Review: As a swimmer, my daughter is obsessed with these shoes. Oddly, or not, the white Croc is one of the most elusive colors to come by, and Amazon delivered. I don’t think she’s taken them off. Side note: And the magic eraser (from a major brand) cleans these up beautifully.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019

Title: Happy to find the basic Crocs still available at a reasonable price. Worn them for years.
Review: Worn these for years as house shoes. Happy they still make and sell these. I developed neuropathy in my legs and it effects my feet too.I use cotton socks with these and the design allows air and room but still gives to support and cushion needed (even if a lil large) for people also susceptible to painful mio-facitis like myself. Don't want that again! I am happy they still sell the basic ones that are less expensive than some of the others. Even though I do own several of the more expensive stylish Crocs sandals and shoes. Mostly for comfort.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2018

Title: Very comfortable!
Review: These are my second pair of crocs. I love how comfortable they are. I run errands with these and they make me feel like I’m walking barefoot especially because of the holes. Love! Will recommend and buy again :)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020

Title: They're exactly as expected except for the weird insole "mini-spikes."
Review: Got them for my 12-year-old along with the little charms the kids stick in the holes. She immediately put them on and skip away, only to shriek and stop in her tracks due to the unexpected little mini-spikes that are all over the insoles. I guess you get used to them, but I'm not sure of their purpose, especially for the soft skin of kids. But she wore them - with socks this first time, which was nuts. But I don't ask questions.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019

Title: Perfect Fit!
Review: Bought these for my wife who is 9 months pregnant. I knew she needed something for the hospital and she was surprised with how comfortable they were. Crocs knows what they are doing when it comes to shoes. They fit awesome for her and she’s excited to not only wear them around the house but also at the hospital.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020

Title: Comfortable and Accurate Sizing!
Review: I live in Central Wisconsin. On many mornings, I walk about 50 yards to open up my chicken coop to let them free range. On many mornings, there is dew on the ground. I no longer wreck my shoes with water stains! They slip on and off very quickly and are more comfortable than boots. Easy to clean with a garden hose.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020

Title: Great shoes for around the house.
Review: Absolutely love these crocs. I was just looking for something to wear around the house so I picked a bright color to keep me from wearing them outside. The color is really nice and as pictured. These fit true to size. I wear size 9 wide with shoes. I bought the regular width size 9 and they are comfortable—fit perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Lovely sunny crocs
Review: i already own a pair that I use to go to my yard but because we are all doing changes with this new way of life, I decided to purchase new ones just to use inside the house, lovely color!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020

Title: Size 8 US Men - Good fit on a slightly wide foot
Review: I have a slightly wide foot, size 8 men's, and they fit comfortably in the size 8 US Men's Classic Clog (the standard size, not wider model). It's roomy, but not to the point where my foot flops around feels insecure, and there's enough room to wear the clogs with socks on. I like that they're easy to slip on and off and have good traction on wet surfaces. So now I just have to see how they'll do over time. They're replacing a pair of sandals that I bought in Hawaii thirty years ago and are still wearable, but I like the fact that the Crocs have a little more toe protection.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2018

Title: Don't think about it. Just do it!
Review: Crocs have been super trendy lately so I just decided one day, why not? Best. Decision. Ever. They are SO comfortable. Not to mention I can wear them with anything. I mean literally anything. Jeans? Yes. Sweats? Yes. Pajamas? Yes. I chose white so they go perfectly. I was worried about the size because I'm usually a 6.5 but it was either 6 or 7. I chose 6 and I was pleasantly surprised. They are the best go-to shoes I own!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020

Title: Comfy....handy and great for stepping outside or a cruise through the grocery store!
Review: Some say Crocs are ugly......well they've never worn a pair! So comfy and enjoyable to wear...I use them on the farm when I go feed our animals in the warmer months...and use them around the house and the occasional trip to the store!  Comfy..non slip and a great alternative to traditional sandals, flip flops or slip on shoes! I'm on my second pair now!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019

Title: Very comfortable
Review: Fits nicely just like the old pair of size Medium Crocs which I have been wearing for 20 years.  The old ones are now  getting worn at the bottom and I thought they might fall apart and I won't have a pair of comfortable Crocs to wear.  But the old ones are still really comfortable.  Now, I wear them both - alternating the old and the new Crocs after each wash.  Am really surprised that the old Crocs are still in excellent condition after 20 years!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2019

Title: As Expected
Review: This is my second pair. I purchased this second pair as I can’t find my original pair and still have one foot that is very swollen post broken ankle surgery. I should have purchased a larger pair for the duration of swelling but didn’t think about it. So not working like I wanted them to but LOVE the color and will wear once the swelling goes down.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020

Title: Excellent product
Review: Our third pair. Perfect 4 summer. Better than house shoes for retrieving morning paper on wet grass. Great for yard work; just hose them off or take them in shower and rinse them off.Great for shower room at “YMCA” or all gyms and public shower stalls where the floor is suspect or college dorms, etc.  Ashame they have to be imported😱
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020

Title: Why did I wait so long to try these?
Review: I have been having some problems with ingrown toenails (related to wearing a very expensive pair of joggers) and needed something comfortable and wide enough to give my toes some space.  These have been on my feet every day since I received them. They are HEAVEN!!! Nice soft soles with great shock absorption and good support.  Just LOVE these!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020

Title: and we absolutely love them! They are super lightweight
Review: I got these for me and my husband to walk the dog, and we absolutely love them!  They are super lightweight, provide perfect stability and comfort, and you can stick them under a garden hose and they look brand new.  Honestly never had crocs before, but these are truly something spectacular.  I like the look of them, my husband thinks they are ugly, yet he wears them everywhere so that must tell you something about how comfortable they are :)  We have not had them for very long yet so I cannot speak on the durability and longevity of these shoes, but I will definitely be back to update.  Thank you!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2016

Title: LOVE
Review: Ordered Ice Blue. A beautiful color.I LOVE crocs. I wear a 10 womens, ordered a 10 . Perfect fit. Croc classic are the most comfortable clog ever.  I own 4 pair, bu I want more. I love the colors, the comfort,  everything about crocs.  My next color are going to be grass green. Lol
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019

Title: Comfortable!
Review: I’m not gonna lie I used to make fun of these shoes all the time. Then I tried a pair on and omg so comfy! I purchased hot pink and they came exactly as that. I love to wear these anytime and anywhere. I have flat feet and they are super comfortable. I’m deff going to be buying more colors.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020

Title: I love crocs!
Review: Does fit a little on the big side. They are quite wide and roomy but I believe that helps your feet breath as well as leaving plenty of room to wear socks if wanted to. They are very soft almost squishy material. But comfortable and durable material. I ordered a size 7 in women’s I only have about a half size of room left. I would order the size your normally are don’t size up or down.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020

Title: You can’t really go wrong with Crocs!
Review: Can you really go wrong with crocs?  Sure, they are ugly as dried mud, but oh are they sooo comfy!!  My podiatrist suggested them to wear instead of slippers and said they are one of the best things you can put on your feet. This is my 4th pair.  I do really love the dark gray, but I still won’t wear them in public, lol.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020

Title: Good after a size exchange
Review: My kids love crocs. I don't know if this was a fluke or not but this pair ran small. This is a woman's 9 and it fits like a women's 8.  I previously purchased a women 8, and when I received it I held it up to my daughter's women's 7 and it was the exact same size.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020

Title: Easy on, easy off
Review: Just what I was looking for, something easy to slip on when I walk the dog. When it's early in the morning or middle of the night and my canine wants to venture out, sometimes it's not easy to affix my shoes to my hooves when I'm half asleep. I can just slip these suckers on without even trying. They're ugly but in a charming way. They are moderately comfortable, though they do make my feet sweat. Not really a problem though since I plan on wearing them even when it's cold outside.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2017

Title: Finally broke down (literally) and bought a pair
Review: I bought these while I was in the hospital recovering from an ATV accident. I was at the beach with my family and friends and had to be life flighted, in the process - my shoes were forgotten. At the hospital they kept giving me these nonslip socks to wear and I decided crocs would be easy to slip off and on in the hospital room as I did my PT and they are comfortable enough to use with a walker or in the shower. Amazon Prime had them here in 2 days, they were cheap, and they were exactly what I needed.I wear between an 8 and 8.5 in women's and these 8's fit perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2017

Title: Crocs for a win
Review: I spend 40 hours a week on my feet on concrete floors. And I walk a lot. I have a very difficult time finding shoes that I don't ache to take off before a couple hours have past. I have wide feet, tall feet, and have a heel lift I wear in my left shoe (which creates its own shoe criteria). I need slip resistant ventilated shoes. These classic crocs fit the bill. I will always be wearing these with socks. They are wide enough for my feet, tall enough for my instep (even with the heel lift) and are quite comfortable to wear all shift. These are not fashion shoes and I don't expect them to be that, but for all the rest of the times, these will be the shoes I wear. My only caution would be that these shoes have little cushion. The rubber does have some give but it is not the same as a well padded shoe. For me this is acceptable because they don't hurt my feet to wear. Other's may find that to be a turn off.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2015

Title: Finally a perfect work shoe!
Review: I have been on the hunt for comfortable work shoes for years and I can’t believe I never tried crocs. My feet and knees are finally happy. I work 40+ hours a week and I have finally found relief from my constant foot pain. And they are super cute. Can’t wait to order more!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020

Title: I've bought cheaper immitations - don't bother - they hurt my feet.  These Crocks are comfortable.
Review: After owning one pair of Crocks which I loved, I tried to buy something cheaper just for gardening.  Actually I tried a couple of imitations and only ended up with painful feet.  Finally, I bought these and I'm back to walking in comfort again.  Crocks are worth it.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020

Title: You need at least one pair
Review: Everyone should own at least one pair of crocs!!! They are comfortable and like walking on air. Working long shifts at an ER, my feet used to hurt wearing any shoes but wearing crocs my feet never hurt again. Now I wear them everywhere and got so many people wearing them. You won’t regret having a pair.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020

Title: Just Right!
Review: These were a birthday gift (by request) and they were a hit!  She normally wears 8.5, so since they don't come in half sizes, I ordered a 9 - which was TOO big.  However, the return was easy, I quickly ordered a size 8 and it was perfect.  Plus the Ballerina Pink was a great color choice!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020

Title: Comfy shoes, bit of a friction issue
Review: These things are super comfy and fit my feet perfectly, only issue is when worn without socks the rubbing between the clog and my foot creates hot spots. As i get used to them this goes away, but definitely worth thinking about if you are buying them and planning on a lot of walking right away.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020

Title: Perfect
Review: This was a requested gift for our granddaughter's 13th birthday!  She had to have white, which is a little more difficult to find during the "Age of COVID".  It is VERY important to measure the foot!  She usually wears a size 4, which was impossible to find, after her dad measured her foot, it said a size 6...which fit perfect!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020

Title: Good quality but too small
Review: Great crocs quality but fits too small. This is the next size up from my son's current size and when they were delivered we held them side by side and they looked like the same size as the old ones although the size on the bottom said differently. Unfortunately we have to return and order 2sizes up this time and hopefully those will fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2020

Title: Where have you been all my life!?
Review: This was my first pair of crocs, after poo-pooing them for years.  Now I regret waiting so long!  These shoes are perfect for something quick to slip into to run errands, walk the dogs, or head to the park.  AMAZINGLY comfortable (think walking on clouds comfortable), durable, and light-weight.  My sandals, that I've lived in for years, are taking a back seat to my new croc beauties.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019

Title: LOVE LOVE! Comfiest shoes for around the house and errands.
Review: Yay!! My summertime clogs came in! I've been using the winter Crocs and felt like they were too hot for the warmth that's going to come. I decided to switch it up a bit since I know my 9 WOMENS run big which is perfect for winter and fuzzy socks... but for summer I decided to size down for just the perfect fit! I'm an 8.5 and ordered an 8 WOMENS 6 MEN and don't regret it at all.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020

Title: Especially great for swollen feet!
Review: I'm having new problems that has caused my feet to swell.  These shoes are great due to the ample foot-bed, wide and very roomy.  I have bought 4 pairs for summer, one size bigger than usual.  They are esp. great (esp. during pandemic) because you can throw them into the washing machine.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020

Title: Black Crocs rule!
Review: Let's face it. Crocs are ugly. Having said that, I bought these and wear them constantly - they are like walking barefoot with rubber bumpers. I had to re-learn my natural gait after hip replacement last year and Crocs were my go-to shoe during that time. I've recommended Crocs to friends having knee surgery for the same reason. These classic style black Crocs are the same size as purple classics I've had for years but these fit the way shoes should - I didn't realize how loose and big the older pair were. I believe they were manufactured in different countries which seems to make a difference in sizing. Go Crocs!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2018

Title: Great for watering the yard and backpacking!
Review: I am not a crocs on the street kind of gal but I needed a decent shoe for watering my flowers and weeding in the yard. I had bought the more expensive Birkenstock garden version but they were too stiff and uncomfortable. I knew from backpacking that crocs can be quite comfortable and a life saver when crossing creeks etc so I decided on these as my garden muck shoes! They work well but look goofy!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2019

Title: Cute? No. Practical? Absolutely
Review: If you've never owned crocs before I really highly recommend them. Don't get me wrong I do not wear these to work or to social events. I don't buy them because they're cute. I buy them because they're practical. I can wear them in the river or when I'm gardening. They also are great to take hiking in case you don't want to jam your feet into your tennis shoes when you have to get up and out of your tent in the middle of the night. I imagine if I lived on a beach I'd wear them there too. They are super easy to clean and I honestly could wear them for days on end I think they're so comfortable.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2016

Title: best buy of my life. MUST HAVE!!
Review: wow. what can i say. it's been a few years since i got these crocs and they have been with me through thick and thin. crocs are a HUGE thing at my camp so it was imperative that i buy a pair. the only problem was what color to get and where to buy them from??? i found these on amazon and fell in love. the color is sososo pretty. i got so many complements. also if you are buying crocs you MUST buy JIBBITZ!!!!!!!!! really important. all of my croc holes currently have jibbitz in them and it makes them 100x cuter.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019

Title: Nice purple Crocs
Review: I'm so happy these are coming back in style. They're super comfortable and the bright colors are so much fun. I'm old enough  to be a grandmother and I like putting the little decorative Jibbitz in the holes.  I like having several pairs in different colors.  They're so comfy I don't care if people think they're ugly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020

Title: Very good quality and price!
Review: Great fit for my size 10 feet, and the best part is that these cost MUCH less than they do at the store. I've purchased cheap knockoffs that cost almost as much as these, and they werent half as good. I've worn these every day and the soles dont show any wear. More importantly, they are soft and comfortable, while the knockoffs are stiff and uncomfortable. Some people like to wear these barefoot or with socks, while I prefer to place "Oder Eaters" or some other foam in them.  Very good quality and price!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2018

Title: Great as always!
Review: Love my Crocs! I have always loved Crocs but haven't purchased them in the past with my shoe size being a true 7.5. I've always felt the 8 was too floppy/loose and 7 was snug and unable to use the strap if wanted/needed. But, I love the feel of wearing Crocs so I went ahead and bought the 7's. Yes they are snug, but they are so comfortable I don't mind! Plus I never wear them with the strap down anyway. Recommend!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020

Title: Adequate replacement; okay arch support but not as flexible as I wanted.
Review: This style was the closest I could find that resembled my crocs that finally wore holes through the bottom after 12 years. The arch support is okay; my older ones did have more arch support & fit me better. The older ones also had more flexibility because of the material they were made from. At the time there was only one kind of croc. Now there are so many styles,  so I may have to try other styles to find a completely satisfying replacement.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2019

Title: Bought two pairs.
Review: I bought two pairs of the same black crocs a day a couple days apart, and one pair is from the distribution chain in Mexico, which are a bit more tough and fit more true to a shoe size, and the other pair came from the distribution chain in China, which happened to be a bit softer and roomier pair. Both look pretty much the exact same, but there's slight differences based on which country you get yours from. Overall not a big deal, I love mine and prefer the ones from China honestly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020

Title: Once you wear Crocs you wont go back to other sandels.
Review: I've been a Crocs fan forever. For sandals, they are the best. Super comfy, light and long lasting.Just be careful to not leave it out in the heat. It will shrink. We live in the valley in LA and they have shrunk when left out side in 90 plus Fahrenheit weather.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020

Title: Soo comfy especially w socks (in the privacy of your home)
Review: What can I say it’s a croc shoe. Fits and works as expected. It’s a replacement pair for a pair I had for 9 years that had finally worn down - I only use them in the backyardIf you are new to crocs; a nerdy piece of advice, if you wear them with socks you’ll be sooo comfy like you’re wearing those adult onesies Amazon sells & any cool factor you had is gone but you won’t care because you are that comfy.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2019

Title: Cute and comfortable.
Review: These are so cute! They are a bit snug on my feet, I wear a 8 but got a 9 just for width, however that didn’t make any difference for width. I can still wear with socks just but not thick socks. I suggest if you have a wide foot, go up a couple of sizes. Although I got a 9 they do not look like boats on my feet, which is positive. These came much quicker than expected and I will buy again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020

Title: So comfortable. Great for kayaking.
Review: I’m definitely a croc girl now! I bought a pair with the fur on the inside for winter while I was pregnant and they were soo comfy. I now ordered these for summer. Wore them kayaking and they obviously work well in water. They dried really fast after getting out of the water.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020

Title: Affordable and Comfortable Slides in Style
Review: I own a black pair of crocs and I love them. I wear them when I am cleaning or doing something outside. I bought these white crocs for my daughter. She wears them for style and are easy to slide on and they fit comfortably. She wears them out a lot and around the house. Amazon has them for a great price. Much cheaper than buying them from the store directly. I bought my son a pair too!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020

Title: really comfortable but can be sweaty and get pebbles
Review: i ordered several crocs (diff styles) - all clogs1- sizes are inconsistent from color to color and style to style2- left in the heat they will shrink and distort - that being said i needed to return 1 pair as the shoe was severely deformed- probably in the shipping3- therefore - make sure return shipping is free4- i do find most of the crog clogs to be INCREDIBLY comfortable5- they make your feet sweat  - the kinds without holes are worse - BUT they are easily washable6- front holes suck - pebbles often end up in the shoe7- once the sole wears down  they are INCREDIBLY slippery - anywhere a parking lot is painted is particularly dangerous8- i think they make the best slippers ever as the support is awesome9 - i love the fact they weigh almost nothing10 - i also got the styles without holes for colder and wetter weather11 - dont leave in the sun or heat they will shrink - some people use this to get a better fit
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2016

Title: Can't go wrong with Crocs!
Review: I have been wearing this style of Crocs for many years.  Can't go wrong with them.  I have feet that are difficult to fit and need to wear something around the house that has a bit of arch support.  Crocs are the only footwear that fits the bill.  The toe box is ample, the width is just right, the length fits perfectly.  In "normal" shoes, I wear a size 10 XXW and these are perfect!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019

Title: Love These Crocs
Review: These Crocs (as always) are incredibly comfy, durable, breathable, lightweight, and easy to clean.  Attractive??  Not so much. (But I will say that I love this particular color!!) Perfect for wearing around the house/doing outside work...especially as the weather warms up. Crocs are a staple in my closet.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020

Title: LOVE THE COLOR!
Review: I am a college kid who needed shower shoes for the upcoming semester, I live crocs and have been wanting a pair as it is... so this gave me a good excuse to finally buy them!These came out exactly as expected! I chose the color “pool” and LOVE them. Super vibrant and colorful, I am a 7 and they fit great. Awesome quality- highly recommended.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020

Title: Nurse that works long hours and loves these
Review: As a nurse who works 16 hour shifts, I was surprised when a coworker recommended I try crocs. They are by far my go to shoe for work, I am able to quickly clean them with bleach wipes at the end of my shift prior to putting them in my designated bag for my shoes in the back of my car!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Brother Likes Them
Review: Bought for my brother who has back trouble. He, like me, has wide feet. He said they were big, then put socks on and said they were fine. He will probably need a couple of days to get used to have shoes that aren't squeezing his feet. He'll probably love them after a week of wearing.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020

Title: Nice for quick trips
Review: These are great to slip into/out of for quick trips to the mailbox or garden. The fit is good except I can feel one of my toes hitting the clog on my left foot, so I probably wouldn't wear them for long walks. I think this is because of my feet and not the shoes. Overall, just what I wanted.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020

Title: She loves their fit and how comfortable they are
Review: My daughter suddenly has a Croc obsession.  She has about 7 pairs, all different colors.  She loves their fit and how comfortable they are.  She has been wearing them to school (high school) and seems to be starting a trend.  She also wears them to the softball field and in between games. (Camo is her field color)  She referred her friends to Amazon as the shipping is free AND they have a great variety AND they are cheaper than at the outlets.  I think I will even be getting a pair or 2 for Christmas...  :)  BUT WE CANNOT FIND PURPLE FOR A LOWER PRICE!  That is her high school color...  They aren't as cheap as the other colors for some reason.  :(But we still love Crocs!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2015

Title: CROCS are great shoes
Review: I have been a CROC wearer for many years.  This was a replacement pair for some that were wearing out after 6+years.  I re-ordered the same size as the previous pair, but these seem a little shorter in the toe area -- not enough to return but just slightly smaller.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020

Title: Crocs are so comfortable!
Review: My husband, myself and kids all got Crocs for Christmas and they are awesome! My oldest son is past the youth sizes (he wears a size 6 kids shoe usually and needed an adult size in Crocs). His was a little trickier but otherwise they were straight forward sizing.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020

Title: Absolutely amazing
Review: The best thing on this earth for anyone’s feet!! Bought a pair for myself and my boyfriend. He absolutely hate the style, and so do I. But I cannot deny how freaking comfortable they are!!! I have trouble finding good comfortable sneakers because I have semi wide feet. But these are absolutely amazing and comfy. Great for the entire family!! Also the material is so nice, it will not allow your foot to slide out of the shoes at all. And cleaning then is super easy. No complaints.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018

Title: I'm sorry I waited so long!
Review: I've been aware of these since they came on the market but have never been motivated to try a pair, what a mistake.They are the do-all shoe. They are shower shoes, gardening shoes, mow the lawn shoes, kick around the house shoes. If they get dirty just hose 'em off and you're good to go again. They have great grippers on the bottom and don't slip on a wet patio like flip-flops do. Why oh why did I wait so long, better late than never!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020

Title: Convienent shoes
Review: The ideal user for this product is any person boy or girl who is looking for a comfortable, durable, and water resistant shoe. These shoes are perfect slide on shoes for any quick, pick up situation. Whether that be running errands, taking the dog out, or anything else. These shoes are made for all ages, come in a variety of colors and are made for both sexes.These shoes are very durable and water resistant. I bought a pair of white ones in august of 2017, and they still look brand new (and I wear them way too often.) They clean up very easily and are perfect if the ground outside is wet or muddy. They have holes along the side and on the top which allows your feet to breathe. An amazing quality about these shoes is that they are wide enough so you have enough space in the shoe to wear a sock!These shoes have many positive characteristics about them. I would say the most positive aspect of them is that they are very convenient, and can be worn in any situation. But other positive aspects of these shoes are that they are comfortable, breathable, easy to clean, water resistant, come in all colors, and the list is endless!Most people are hesitant in purchasing these shoes because of the way they look, but since 2016 crocs have become popular again. If a shoe like these are this comfy no one should care about what they look like! I have had a very positive experience with my crocs and I would recommend any to purchase these, because they are worth the money. I am all about convenience and these shoes are my go to whenever I’m about to run out and need to slide something on quick.These shoes are made for everyone and not only are they convenient for an adult to wear, they are perfect shoes for children to wear as well. They can get them dirty and run around outside and the can be cleaned off fast, while not being ruined. They also sell gibbets for these shoes, making them personable and a fun attraction for children.Overall I would give these shoes overall a very positive review because I have gotten a lot of use out of mine. They are worth every penny and a great investment. They last a long time and are great shoes to own.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2018

Title: Crocs are awesome!
Review: I purchased a pair of these for my mother and mother-in-law. They both have never owned crocs before and ABSOLUTELY loved them!! I purchased the teal and the coral and both colors are BEAUTIFUL.  Crocs in themselves are incredibly comfortable, easy to clean, and fit well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020

Title: These crocs last forever
Review: I already had a similar pair of Crocs when I ordered these.  I decided I wanted one pair for inside the house, and the other pair for outside.  Even though I normally wear a size 8.5, Crocs don't come in half-sizes, so I ordered an 8, and they fit very well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2020

Title: Most comfortable shoe
Review: I finally convinced myself to get these and it was the best decision. They are so comfortable. I initially got a size 11 but had to return them to get a 12 due to needing a wider width. These are the only size 12 shoes I own so the size may run a bit smaller in width.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020

Title: The best house shoes ever made
Review: This is my third pair of Crocs clogs. I personally think they're ugly and I can't figure out how they ever became fashionable but so it goes. The thing is, I have fallen arches (pes planus) and I my feet kill (I used the word "kill" to describe pain) me sometimes! These are far and away the most comfortable things I can put on my feet. They're light as air and they kind of form-fit to my arches. It's like getting a mini-massage just by walking around. I wear them whenever I'm lounging around the house or doing chores but I don't wear them outside at all. Something else to note: They don't stink. At least not for a long time. I think that's pretty remarkable. When they do start to smell, I couldn't really figure out an effective way to clean them so I just threw them away and bought new ones (they also lose their form a little after a year or so). I figure I can afford a pair every year or so so that I can have happier feet.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2013

Title: New Convert to Crocs <3
Review: I have resisted these shoes for years! Finally tired of ruining my regular shoes by wearing them in the garden or accidentally stepping in something I should have picked up earlier, I have finally found a shoe that I can wear and wash--and is TRULY COMFORTABLE AND LIGHT. You don't really think about how light shoes are until you put Crocs on. In fact, I liked them so much I bought a second pair to wear out and about. I never thought it would happen but I am truly a Crocs lover now!To be fair, I don't love the way they look, and my feet sometimes get cold so I bought socks. (Yes, I went there!) But I have gotten to a point in my life that function beats form and I am the happier for it.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2015

Title: Good buy!
Review: My husband and I were apprehensive to purchase these crocs initially but after reading the reviews, we hesitantly purchased them and I am glad we did.  It has been 6 months now since we've purchased them and they are still holding up well. They are great quality and definitely originals. They also fit true to size and look exactly as seen in the photo.NB. My husband wears size nine in all regular shoes, so we ordered size 9 & it fit well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019

Title: Good quality crocs!
Review: When wearing a 9.5, the 10 was huge. I suggest a 9, size down. The orange color is bold and they look nice. Exellent quality.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020

Title: Comfortable.  Keeps feet cool and dry.
