Review: So comfy.  I bought these to use for indoors.  My usual house slippers are way too hot for this California weather.  These crocs keep my feet cool and dry.  I normally wear a size 7.5 and I bought the size 8.  It’s perfect, not too loose.  Bought another pair to use for outdoors.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020

Title: Admirably covers my husband's big feet
Review: Crocs are ugly. We all know it. Nobody buys crocs to be a fashion icon (I hope). This aside, they're a good utilitarian shoe. My husband has to wear close-toed shoes to his work, and tennis shoes were killing his feet (they're big and not made to fit inside confining shoes ha).He has to wear socks with them (really highlighting his stellar sense of fashion) because apparently the holes on top pull the hair out of the top of his feet. Go figure. However other than that, he says they're comfortable and provide good support.I was also pleased that these shoes come in boat size, as not all brands carry for large-footed people.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2016

Title: Looks Like Yuck,  Feels Great
Review: I usually wear a size 10D, and ordered these in size 10D.  If I wore these with socks, they'd be a perfect fit.  In bare feet, they're just a little loose (surprise surprise).  I wish they'd been available in my size in another color.  My only option was Khaki, which looks like rice-fed doggy poop.  But I don't wear 'em to look at them.  I wear them because they feel great.  And for the price (under $20, delivered by amazon Prime, go amazon!) I can't complain.  They're great clomp around clogs, keep your feet warm wet or dry, kick out irritants through the many open holes, and are very comfortable on my feet.  I have yet to use the heel strap or take them for a significant walk, but that's not why I bought them.  I wanted super easy on and off, comfortable enough to run errands in, and secure enough on my feet that I didn't have to think about where I put my feet when walking in them.  They fit the bill quite nicely, thank you very much.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2013

Title: As always crocs are way too expensive!
Review: Well all crocs are oversized so I can’t even wear socks with these. The last pair of crocs I had about 12 years. I didn’t think I’d like the straps but you can fold them up on top of the shoe if you want to. I do use the straps when I’m driving. As always crocs are way too expensive!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020

Title: I love my crocs!!
Review: I absolutely love my crocs! They are the easiest shoes to slide in and out of, and you can get them FILTHY. All you need to do is take a wet rag and wipe them off, or blast them with the hose. Then BOOM, clean. I wear these season round, with winter-y socks, of course. I have had the crocs professional bistro clogs for work (I work in foodservice) for awhile now, which led me to just buy regular crocs because they were just soo comfy. Highly recommend for people looking for easy-on, easy-off shoes that are very comfy.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020

Title: I’ve been wearing Crocs for years!! They’re Great!!! 😄😄
Review: I love Crocs. I have worn them at work for years. I work 12 or 13 hour days and I’m on my feet a lot. My feet used to hurt by the end of the day when I was wearing athletic shoes, but not with Crocs on. My feet stay comfortable all day.  I wear Crocs year round, even in the snow and rain.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020

Title: Saves me from going in store AMAZING
Review: Love my crocs but I didn't want the embarrassment of buying them in store, so amazon saved me from that. I'm a nurse in a nursing home type setting in Florida where it is hot. We walk outside a lot from building to building. So, airy crocs have saved me from sweaty tennis shoes on hot days.They fit just like in store would
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019

Title: FIFTH PAIR...
Review: ... and counting.  Years ago, when I got my first pair of Crocs, I was dubious and totally unconvinced they'd live up to expectations.  Boy, was I mistaken!  Today, I have a pair of originals for warm-weather outdoor use, and another no-holes, fuzzy-lined pair for cold-weather outdoor use.  These are replacements for a worn-out indoor-only pair.  Crocs have essentially become my go-to house slipper and, used with a pair of plush socks, provide daylong comfort.  The arch support is superb and when I'm at the workbench, standing on a bare, concrete floor, my feet are happy!Enough gushing.  If you've worn them, you know exactly what I'm talking about!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015

Title: Not perfect but close
Review: I love the soft pink color. I wear an 8 and without the strap, these fit great. With the strap my left foot which is slightly larger than the right feels like it reaches to the top. I know a 9 would be too big. I'm keeping them anyway, hoping they will loosen a little.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020

Title: FIRST TIME CROC BUYER
Review: Very comfortable! I have concrete tile floors so it helps my back. Bought a less expensive pair to see if I like them and if the size was right. Since they are Unisex shoes check the size chart. For example a Men's size 10 is a Woman's size 12. I wear a size 10 in a sneaker so a size 10 in a Croc was plenty big enough as they fit slightly larger. I wear them as a clog with the strap folded to the front. Great for a slip-on to run to the mailbox. I will get another pair.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2019

Title: Better than In-site purchase !
Review: These CROCS are my first Crocs and was kinda iffy about them at first . But now , I am obsessed with them ! Super light , comfortable and perfect for lounging around during this quarantine . This is the mint color and the color is bright and clean - just as i expected . I was going to purchase these on the Crocs site but it was more convenient to purchase through Amazon since it was more economic and with Prime arrived in less than a week . The fit was perfect for me - all I had to do was follow the size guide ! Recommend 10/10 !
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020

Title: Bought three pairs now
Review: I always made fun of people that wore crocs until I tried some. I can’t believe how comfortable they are. Especially for me I have to buy special shoes or inserts with arch support but these crocs are very comfortable as it is. And as promised they’re very good around the water.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020

Title: Comfortable to wear all day
Review: Comfortable to wear all day.. We have several pairs in our family!  Some seem to run a little large...but not so much to pose a problem.  My hubby has narrower feet, so a little wide, but not sloppy feeling.  I have wide feet and mine always fit fine.  Slight arch support, probably enough for most people... I have plantar fasciitis - so no, not enough arch support for me, I wear an arch pad in all my softer shoes...  Wear in yard, on dock, around town etc...  Do watch..as heel tread wears off, can be a bit slick when walking on wet wood or metal docks...(time to buy new ones, as with most shoes/sneakers).
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2016

Title: Extremely comfortable and a good fit.
Review: I love these shoes. I work 12 hour night shifts at an assisted living facility, so I'm on my feet a lot. I've bought expensive shoes in the past which were not as comfy as these. And best of all, my feet no longer sweat. In other shoes my feet would sweat which would make them cold (not good in Wisconsin winters). Not so with these. Definitely will order more.Size fit perfectly. I wear an 8 1/2-9 wide and the women's nine was just right.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2019

Title: I LOVE THEM
Review: so it was my first time ordering crocs and I am firmly a size 6.5 but they don’t come in half sizes. so i decided to go half a size up just in case and the size 7 fit perfectly!!!! the color is even prettier in person and they are so comfy! i will definitely be ordering more in the future
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020

Title: Perfect lawn and garden footwear
Review: In south GA, winter lawns can get soggy. These plastic shoes allow for outdoor time keeping my feet dry from wet grass and aired out via breeze holes. Very sturdy and durable, i have even walked the dogs with them and they are comfortable after a mile walk. We have a section of the yard that floods, requiring me to set up a pump system to drain water. These shoes stay on my feet as i wade the waters to place the pump in the center. They are easy to walk in thru the water.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2019

Title: Comfy Crocs
Review: I bought these for my daughter and she loved them, and alot cheaper than buying them through the Crocs website.  They were so comfortable I bought myself a pair.  Also, we couldn't find this color on the Crocs website either.  I would recommend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020

Title: Great for 'round the house....
Review: I've never tried Crocs until last week. Always wore thong sandals out around the house, when I was too lazy to put on real shoes/sandals. These are easy to slide into...are pretty darn comfortable...fit is good! I wear an 11EE shoe, with a high instep. My foot actually measures 10.5, but 11 fits better. I would say this fits true to size (unisex mens 11). I probably have 1/2" of space at the heel....which is fine. Plenty of room in the shoe. Came in a Croc bag with their tags on the shoe....so they seem to be authentic. I would recommend!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2016

Title: My first Crocs.....and they are sweeeeeeeet!
Review: I bought these for camping.....but I haven't taken them off (other than to sleep and shower) for days. These really are comfortable. They are really great for standing on concrete in the shop. They feel like you are standing on a fatigue mat or something!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020

Title: I'm Addicted to Crocs
Review: This is my 3rd pair of Crocs and I must admit, I've developed an obsession. They're so comfortable and feels like your feet are getting a little massage every time you take a step, lol. The fit is perfect and I was even more excited to customize them just the way I wanted. I think I want every color at this point.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020

Title: Might not be able to select size
Review: This is my second pair of crocs and I’m super happy with them. It didn’t let me select my size so I was a little worried that my size wouldn’t come but it did! So I’m content with both my sets of crocs. If you’re worried about this, search your size specifically and more often than not you’ll get your size without having to pay full price. I got these for $29
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020

Title: Great with socks, blisters without them.  Super comfortable.
Review: I've had to recant all the insults I've leveled at friends for wearing crocs in public...  They are super comfortable.The fit is as expected and they've held up well so far.  I can't wear them without socks without getting blisters or severe rubbing after an hour or so, but with socks they are as comfortable as they get.  I will probably get some of their slippers/moccasins as I think they'll be a very comfortable if they're anything like these.All in all, These are great for working on my garage and around the house.  They are easy to clean and super comfortable when worn with socks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2016

Title: So Far So Good
Review: So far, it's easy to wear 'n comfortable, however I do hope this will last longer for the price I paid versus a similar pair I bought from a Daiso store, made of cheap rubber material 'n easily worn out although things are "Made in China" now a days, still any product manufacturer is responsible in using "quality", "decent" 'n "durable" materials as well as making thoughtful, "experimented", sound design for a product to withstand daily wear with occasional treading on treacherous, rough ground to occasional speedy pace on a walk.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2017

Title: “Roomy Fit” Crocs. You’re Gonna Love These More Than Your Other Pair or Pairs...
Review: When I took these out of the package I noticed a tag that said “Roomy Fit”. I had not seen that on my other pairs (I have about six pairs that I wear in place of going barefoot). Hey, I really like the extra room. They are wider and seem to have a little more room around toes as well.  I like the khaki color a lot. Like all crocs, these are comfortable and tough. I have already ordered a pair in “denim”.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2019

Title: Crazy comfy
Review: Well these are a surprise. I bought them for a costume and walking around during Halloween noticed that my plantar fasciitis wasn't hurting. That's unusual. So anyway I wear these shoes all day every day and my feet quit hurting. That's kind of crazy but whatever. These things are goofy looking but comfortable beyond compare.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019

Title: Perfect!
Review: I got this for my mom cause she always taking mine, but she really liked them a lot, they are the official brand and feel very comfortable, they are a bit bigger, but it’s okay cause they have sports mode so they still fit very well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020

Title: Perfect for the new COVID life
Review: I should have bought a pair of Crocks sooner. Wearing slippers around the house all day long made my feet hot and damp. Mule style constantly fell off and moccasin style retained moisture and got smelly. Crocks are the solution and clear winner for all day working at home.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020

Title: Hesitant? I was...
Review: So I was the guy saying "No! Never doing Crocks!" I will tell you man I love those things! They are so comfortable and great for camping and trips. Wear them with socks when its cold and not when its hot. Water? Dew on the ground? NO Problem... Don't get me wrong, Flip-Flops have a huge place in my heart but I just took my crocks on a 7700 mile motorcycle camping trip and I was so happy I had them. They were a great component to what I needed to be comfortable. Just give them a try but just don't start wearing them to work. Just not acceptable..
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018

Title: Pretty good shoes...
Review: The only concern I have, is when I want to go for a walk in them, or simply play tennis in my basement... (hitting against the wall)... the bottoms get smoothed out and there is no traction left to slide or walk on. Other than that, they are pretty great! I got the teal color, and absolutely love it!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020

Title: Comfort in spades!
Review: I have plantar fasciitis and get sore feet to boot. I have never been a fan of the look of crocs, but omg they are so comfy for people like me! I’m not sure I’d be brave enough to wear them out, but yes, I will be living in these in my home!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020

Title: Great support and fit.
Review: This shoes are far from fashionable and I *never* wear mine outside the house but they are great comfortable footwear. They were recommended to me by my orthopedic surgeon when I was struggling with plantar fasciitis that was aggravated by the hardwood floors in our apartment. He recommended a pair of Crocs to wear as house slippers since they have great arch support.There fit somewhat sloppy though--that's just the way they are. Don't get them too tight. When in doubt I'd suggest you order the larger size.Easy to slip into and out of and if I spill something on the floor or on the shoes I just wash them off in the sink.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2015

Title: They just work!
Review: Love ‘em or hate ‘em - Crocs are Crocs. These fit the same as the ones I’ve had for about 10 years - except the old ones are worn through the sole. They are the best shoes to kick on when you’ve got to run outside in a hurry to chase off a marauding deer or curious bobcat looking for a tasty chicken dinner. And they’re actually quite comfortable as well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020

Title: Best shoes ever.
Review: I have been on the fence about owning Crocs for a long time. I wasted that time. Buy these shoes. Here pictured you can see they are in "active mode" so they will stay on your feet while fighting crime or kicking rocks. They can also be worn in "relaxed mode" with the thingy on top of your foot for lazy Sundays and doing chores.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020

Title: Great if you have sweaty feet.
Review: I have sweaty feet so rubber sandals are literally the only type of sandals I can wear. Any other sandals I wear I have to wash otherwise it’ll stink. I don’t have to wash these rubber sandals because they don’t stink and don’t absorb my sweat. These are well made and are really durable, but I don’t recommend running in them. They can still rip if you run in them. I had this experience before as it is why I bought a new one from this seller.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020

Title: Nice product, nice price.
Review: I purchased these for my ten year old son and he loves them.  He saw them at the Crocs Outlet Store and they were asking $45.  I checked Amazon and they were $31.  So we were able to get some Jibbitz with the money we saved.  The quality seems very good.  No issues so far.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020

Title: Once You Croc You Just Won't Stop
Review: Do you want your little piggies to be protected from the harsh environment? Do you care about comfort over style? Do you want house shoes that you can wear around your dogs and out in the yard without them falling apart? Do you want to be able to just hose a pair of shoes off after they get dirty? Then these bad boys are what you are looking for. Throw on some socks and some crocs and let's get funky.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019

Title: and always like them. However
Review: I got this particular pair for my son, and he likes to wear it. He is size 6.5 or 7, and he wears the shoes with the strap up, so they fit him very well. He outgrown several pairs of crocs over the years, and always like them.However, if you wanted to wear the strap behind your heel as pictured, buy a size up - the strap is shorter then needed, I wear Woman's size 9 so should fit in this shoes well, but with the strap down, my toes painfully push into the front of the shoe, and I cannot wear them. The problem is consistent - I have several years old pair of the same crocs in another color, and it is the same - fine with the strap up, but I cannot wear it with strap down.The shoes are very lightweight.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2014

Title: Husband is very pleased!
Review: These were for my husband, and he is very happy!  Ordered size 11, one size up from his normal 10, because he wanted to wear them with thick socks for the winter in our chilly house.  They arrived quickly and are exactly what he wanted!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020

Title: Very comfortable
Review: Comfortable shoes.  You can do a lot of walking or standing and your feet still feel great.  Of course this is the first time I ever bought Crocs so I really can't compare these to other Crocs.  The only thing is the heel strap could be tighter.  Other than that great shoe.  I have wide feet and the width is perfect.Would recommend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2019

Title: Perfect fit.
Review: Bought for my 10 year old who usually wears a size 5 in men's, but I got him a size 6 because he is still growing and im glad I did cause as you see in picture he has a little room to grow in them. He likes them and they were a great price. Thank you.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

Title: I am a croc lover now.
Review: I have been wanting these for so long! They are all that I have been talking about for months and I finally got them! They are way more comfortable than I expected. I don't even know how to explain it. They're just cool as heck. They're functional and in my opinion cute as heck. I have been wearing then nonstop showing them off since they arrived. I definitely will be purchasing more!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020

Title: Recommended by my podiatrist
Review: I recently visited my podiatrist because of heel pain. Turns out I have Achilles Tendonitis.  The good news, it's fixable; I can recover from this.  Surprisingly, he mentioned that Crocs are great for this ailment as they provide firm, consistent support, much better than the Dr Scholl's sandals I bought last year.  So, I bought two pair (just to be sure I have enough!).  Now, back to the heel stretching exercises the doc taught me...
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019

Title: Crocs give me life
Review: This was my second pair of crocs after I hadn't worn my first pair in a number of years. I am loving the new color choices and am just as obsessed this time around as the first. They're my house shoe! I regularly wear them around the house and put them on to take the dogs out, take the trash out, sweep the sidewalk - you know, quick little chores where you just want a nice slip-on shoe. I do also occasionally go out in public with them, like to the grocery store or to grab a quick bite to eat. My friends hate them but they're coming into fashion now and it's just about dang time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019

Title: Crocmania
Review: A person can never have too many crocs. Outdoor crocs, indoor crocs, slipper crocs, pool crocs, dog walking crocs, crocs for your dad, crocs for your cat, crocs for your neighbor with questionable morals.I've bought six pairs now. I need more.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020

Title: Best shoes EVER
Review: These are the best shoes you have ever put on.  They are great for every day us.  Perfect for water actives and travel.  They are endorsed by World's Strongest Man Eddie Hall.  Let the Haters Hate! If you ani't CROCING your NOT ROCKING.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2020

Title: Seem to work
Review: I never bought Crocs before. These seem to work OK, so far. My only criticism is I wish they would come in half sizes. I originally bought size 11 which was too tight. I then bought size 12 which was a little too loose but more comfortable than the 11's. An 11 1/2 would probably be just right but that does not seem to be an option.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020

Title: Overall comfortable but could be better for long walks
Review: For the most part the Crocs are very comfortable and durable. My only issue with them is when I take long walks (2+ miles) and the balls of my feet started to hurt (I travel this route frequently and my feet are fine in my other shoes). I'm not sure if its the grooves on the insole or something else causing the problem.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2019

Title: One size too large...
Review: Bought a pair in 2017 as size 12, bought a pair in mid 2020, not run a size too large. My size now is 11 Men’s, and the old pair are 12. My old ones say made in Mexico, the 2020 pair is made in China. Be aware your normal size may run too big on these new ones.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020

Title: great garden shoes
Review: My husband picked up gardening and bought a pair of these for the kid to help him. I then decided to get myself a pair too. We all have pretty wide feet and these are incredibly comfortable. Somehow they don't pinch or slip. Also with the summer heat - the design really helps keep your feet cool and being non-porous - are great for doing things where your feet may get wet or muddy (like gardening).
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020

Title: I live for Crocs
Review: I have worn Crocs for over 10 years and as my aging feet have gotten tired of uncomfortable shoes the Crocs have been a blessing.  I do make sure I check the tread because it does wear down and can be an issue on slippery surfaces.  I have also gotten Crocs for my sister who has Parkinson Disease and it has increased the surface area of her step to make walking easier.  I will definitely continue to order Crocs as needed.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2018

Title: Kinda disappointed
Review: I love crocs! They are so comfortable! This is my first time buying a pair of crocs on amazon and the shoes fit me well but I noticed that one size is wider than the other pair and that disappointed me a lot! Not sure if that’s how crocs are supposed to be made but please AMAZON, check on the shoes carefully! And to answer why I didn’t return it was because I wore it the first day it was delivered to me and didn’t really paid much attention to it till the next day and it was kinda dirty already. I also just ordered another pair after realizing the other pair was wider than the other so I hope it’s not the same problem as my first one.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020

Title: Very Comfortable
Review: I have huge and wide size 13 feet and these fit perfectly. Plus they have a good arch support. And I can choose slip on in the house or use the back strap for driving. They are washable too, which means they are not stinky and don't get ruined right away. I am glad to have made this purchase.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020

Title: Durable and comfortable LOVE THESE THINGS
Review: I've had these crocs for 2 years now and I still wear them around when running errands etc.  it may not be the most glamorous thing but it sure is comfortable.  These crocs are so durable.  If I had a pair of regular flip flops, I would be on at least my 5th or 6th pair. This crocs have paid for themselves many times over.  I've worn them walking over rocks, stones, in showers, in the house, to the store, camping EVERYTHING.  I loved these things so much I bought a pair for my husband in the REALTREE camouflage and he now likes his. (Plus his old flip flops where there is material really starts to stink when he's walking around so crocs don't smell) Hint hint ladies, buy these for your husbands as well! :)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2015

Title: Super Comfy
Review: I resisted Crocs for the longest. But I've pretty much worn them 24/7 throughout this quarantine..now they're all I want to wear! They're just so darn functional!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020

Title: Highly recommend!
Review: Bought these to be supportive house shoes as the majority of my home is hard/tile floors and mylegs get achy! Love how supportive they are and my legs and hips do not hurt after being in my feet a lot. Highly recommended!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020

Title: THE footwear for painfully wide feet
Review: XXX wide feet, widened even more by bunions, RA and three bone-fusing surgeries.  I've been paying big $$$ for Drew shoes and orthotics and lost the ability to walk barefoot at all.  Wearing there the last three weeks I have increased my activity, lowered my pain and foot cramps, and felt my toes spread to their natural width and length.  I also have high arches, and tend to develop bone spurs on the top of the midfoot (Danskos HURT!), but my feet still feel great in these crocs.  Only the classics fit this well.  Buying 3 more.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2016

Title: Most comfortable shoes ever!
Review: This was my boyfriends first pair and he absolutely loves them. It’s all he’s been wearing since they arrived! We will definitely be ordering another pair for him soon and I’ll be ordering a pair for myself as well. So comfortable, easy on the knees and very versatile.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020

Title: aaaahhhh, comfortable
Review: These are the only shoes I can wear, my feet are ruined from 50 years of bartending, waitressing and retail work on my feet up to 60 hours a week.  I wear them with socks and they are more comfortable than my slippers used to be.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020

Title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned.
Review: I have been a fan of Crocs for a very long time. While they are not the most attractive shoe ever, you just can't beat the comfort. I have some issues with foot pain, and my Crocs are the only shoe I have found that completely alleviate the pain. I have tried quite a few of the styles over the years, but this was the first time I have tried the clogs. They are a little snug around the tops of my feet because of my extremely high arches, but I got used to it pretty fast. I wear these almost constantly and i am very happy with them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2016

Title: Perfect fit on my big 15 D feet!
Review: Don't know where they are made but they are made properly as a size 15 D.  I had to return a set of sandals marketed from Great Britain that were way too narrow.  It is a pleasure to get shoes that were made to the proper size, as per the way they are labeled.  These shoes are very comfortable and I am very pleased.  I had a hard time finding Crocs in my size.  They aren't sold in the regular shoe stores and many online shoe stores have a very limited selection of 15 D shoes, as well.  Now if they will just be strong and hold up for a while.  I'll update if they self destruct to early in life.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2016

Title: Crocs naysayers are so silly.  Crocs are awesome.
Review: You don't wear Crocs for a fashion statement.  Well, maybe in some places, but not most places.  They're the flip-flops of the regular shoe community.  So easy to slip on.  So easy to wash off.  When my kids were little, they were "big kid" shoes they could put on themselves.  Now all of my big kids have a pair right outside the backdoor.  Slip them on to do everything year round (we live in Arizona.)  So far nobody has ever accidentally stepped in dog poo, but it could happen and if it did - easily washable.  They wore these shoes at at sleepaway camp for everything from showers to fishing to hiking.  They're durable.  Over the last 6+ years we've owned MANY pairs of Crocs brand originals and think they're all fantastic.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2014

Title: Simply the best
Review: Who doesn’t love some crocadillies?  They’re the comfiest around.  I love the versatility.  You can likely run a marathon or wrestle a gator in these lady killers.  You’re liable to find some night time company if you rock the crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020

Title: Vacation shoes
Review: Perfect fit. I bought them as the only pair of shoes to wear on my island vacation. They went on the airplane, to the beach, and sight seeing. They went with my shorts, swimsuit, jeans, and sun dress. My never hurt and I was comfortable the whole time. Best of all I didn't have to take up precious space in my carry on bag with another pair of shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019

Title: The Most Comfortable Ugly I've Ever Own!!!!!
Review: Yeah, the world has a love/hate relationship w/ Crocs. Yeah, they're ugly. Yeah... I've NEVER wanted to own a pair. But I caved... AND I DON'T REGRET IT!!! These are the MOST COMFORTABLE things I have EVER put on my feet. It's like walking on marshmallows.Please Note: I have wide, flat feet. So, I can NEVER find a pair of comfy shoes wide enough. And I've never had to worry about arch support (because I have none). So, these shoes are actually a GOD-SEND to my Fred Flintstone.I am DEFINITELY buying more.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020

Title: great buy
Review: these are typical crocks.  comfy n sturdy n looks exactly like the pic.  color too.  great price for crocks best 1 we could find. my sons size 10.5/11 n fits perfect.  hes 16 n hard in everything n these are still months later like neewww.  will def buy again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020

Title: Amazing!
Review: My boyfriend never had a pair of crocs before and he had just recently broke a pair of flip flops that he wore all the time. He was sad that he didn’t have any quick slip on shoes that he could wear anywhere so for his birthday I bought him a pair of green crocs and he LOVES them. He wears them all the time even to work now lol.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020

Title: CROCS - classic
Review: Yay ! Thank you !!!!’15 years wearing CROCS and NO foot pain That’s why I have so many I began working in Healthcare over 41 years Got heel spurs since 1978A total knee replacement I stand all day at my pt job No big deal, it comes with the territory
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020

Title: Crocs for Life
Review: Crocs are the best but dont wear in the rain or water. That should be a caution label on the package. Or a sticker on the shoe. Not everyine has common sense. They are so comfortable want to wear all of the time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020

Title: New to Croc's trying them out at physical therapist's urging.
Review: I am new to Crocs. Couldn't get the color I wanted and had to send the 1st pair back as they were way too large. Doing this at the urging of physical therapist. They seem very comfortable but I will see how they last. so far so good and they feel comfortable. Still debating getting another pair at just one size smaller.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020

Title: Very comfy if you go one size up
Review: I decided to go up 1 size, I usually wear size 8 but got the 9 and its a good thing i did because it would have been too close of a fit if I got my actual size. The 9 I got Is very comfy. So i would recommend going up 1 size. To be  honest it about a half size bigger than my foot with the strap up. But when I ise the strap it feel perfect.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020

Title: I Only Wear Crocs
Review: I only wear Crocs. This is my 5th pair in about seven years! I use them in ways they were never intended. I ran a 5k in these, hiked up Mt. Washburn, cleared heavily wooded land, etc. I am not exaggerating. I always wear Crocs. They are tough, fit comfortably, are completely waterproof, reasonably priced and look great. I get a new pair about every 14 months. That's pretty long if its the only shoe you ever wear, like I do! Love them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2017

Title: LOVE these Original Style Crocs
Review: Very happy with this purchase. These are the crafts that I have always known over the years. And some outlet stores, they no longer sell this version. I’m happy to find and have the Crocs that I have always known and loved.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2020

Title: Very Happy with these Crocks
Review: I've never had a pair of Crocks before, with that said i was very impressed with the comfort and arch support in these shoes. I wish i had tried them a couple summers ago! Quality seems decent under normal daily use, will buy again when i need a new pair!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020

Title: Awesomesauce!!!!
Review: I got these crocs for work because I clean pools and spas in the family business so I need non slip waterproof shoes...I'd love to have a pair in every color...only my second pair ever..I'm 49 and dont know why I waited so long to get them...I even wear them around the house..but I have another pair for that!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019

Title: My Go To Slipers
Review: I wear this model of slippers for years. I wear it everyday, usually after 2 years the bottom smoothed out and become slippery, then I bought a new pair with different color. I like the light sky blue color.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020

Title: Comfortable Shoes!  And cute, and a GREAT purple color
Review: I am thrilled with these bright purple shoes.  They are super cute, and so comfortable.  I can feel the little bumps inside the shoe, and I like it!  These feel so good I don't want  to take them off.  They may be my new favorite shoes!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020

Title: Comfortable and easy to put on
Review: They are super comfortable I would give them five stars but I don’t really like the way crocs look so much but that’s just my opinion of them but they are super easy to put on and super super comfortable I would definitely buy again!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020

Title: Will purchase more
Review: I’m very happy with this purchase. I love crocs and needed to change out my very well loved pair. This pair wasn’t exactly like my original pair I had. This one is a little bit more boxy toed. Over I love them and plan on getting more colors
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Crocs are what they are
Review: What are the holes in Crocs for? They are there to let your dignity out.  Jokes aside, these are surprisingly warm and comfortable. I use them essentially as outdoor slippers - trips to the freezer in the garage, taking the trash out, things like that. I also use them as camp shoes, and they are a nice change after a long day in hunting boots.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019

Title: This pair was actually true to size
Review: I ordered a few different pairs and each time the sizing was different, even when it came from the same country!  However, this pair happened to be made in China and was comfortable and was "not too big or too small, it was just right!".
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020

Title: Perfect for gardening. Lightweight, vented, spacious toe.
Review: These are just the best. I bought them for gardening. I have too many other cute sandals to ever wear these out, but you could, many people do. For gardening they are perfect. Wide toe box, secure heel strap, vented, lightweight. I bought my normal size. Even though I have skinny feet these fit fine.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020

Title: Order 1-2 sizes smaller depending on whether you wear socks or not
Review: These shoes are huge for their size.  We ordered 10s at first and they were gigantic and had to be returned.  Downsized to 9s and they are still at least 1 size too long, and kinda loose height and width wise.  If you plan to wear without socks the. Order 2 sizes smaller unless you have a really wide, thick foot.  Upsides are that they are lightweight and comfortable if you order the right size
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2018

Title: Can't believe I love these
Review: They're ugly, so freaking ugly but I love them. Crocs are just so comfortable, perfect for running out real quick. I wore them to church and got some looks so that might be a bad idea, but for going to get the mail or a quick errand, perfect.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020

Title: High toe box and just a smedge wider, just as I need it to be.
Review: Looks like original Crocs, very happy with the fit.  I've been to Crocs stores and if I remember correctly, Crocs makes 3 or 4 different width sizes and toe box sizes.  Could not find a style with the same fit.  Would have purchased different styles if they fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020

Title: Fits fine w/o Sports mode, W/ Sports mode its a little tight
Review: This is my first pair of Crocs and I wear a size w8.5. I got the size m6/w8. When I'm not in sports mode (w/o the strap in the back of my foot), they fit fine and there's some wiggle room, just right! However, when I'm in sports mode (w/ the straps in the back), they fit kind of tight and my big toe rubs against the front.I was debating on whether or not on getting a size m7/w9 too. But I found that when trying it on, it was too big, so I stuck w/ the size m6/w8.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020

Title: These may be fake - but  pretty comfortable anyway
Review: It says made in Vietnam but I thought Crocs were made in the US.  They are much shinier and slicker than my other ones (that were getting worn out on the bottom).  but they fit well and are comfortable, so I kept them.  They are very slick with bare feet, but I usually wear socks anyway.  Also, they did not hand deliver it.  Why do they say that?  Delivery people should not lie.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2019

Title: Not disappointed.
Review: I ordered an 8.Last years pair were more..."roomy."This pair my toes touch the top inside.I dont mind it, I guess I was just used to a little bit more room.  I love this white color..their super cute. 🥰
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020

Review: YES! Yup, uh-huh, yes sir, you bet, yeah, right on... word!!! 👊I wear a 12 & bought a 12 in “Chocolate”, I wear them everywhere.  Summer, winter... doesn’t matter. It’s  all about the socks! Love these kix! 👍
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020

Title: Best comfortable fitting shoe
Review: I love these and wear them a lot. They have the typical Croc roomy fit which feels almost like you're barefoot.  You think that they would come off your foot when you walk but they don't.  They feel sort of gel-like on your feet with their cushiony rubber. I really like the option of using the heel strap or flipping it up so you can slip in and out of them easily, like slippers.  You get used to their quirky appearance, if not, get one of the more traditional looking models. I have three different styles which I wear exclusively as casual shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2016

Title: 2 nd pair as husband wore out first pair
Review: My husband had never worn crocs.  Now he loves them.  Glad they are comfortable and easy to slip on.  He wanted a shoe he could go outside in the wet grass and then be able to rinse them off when back inside the house.Perfect choice.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020

Title: Perfect for wearing to/from games/practices
Review: My daughter wears these Crocs to/from the softball field. Easy to slip on/off over her socks or even bare feet. Don't have to worry about them getting wet or dirty because they dry quickly and are easy to clean by running them under the garden hose. (These match perfectly with her uniforms which are "Carolina Blue" & white/black.)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019

Title: Very Comfortable Shoes!
Review: My husband has recently been suffering from gout.  His regular shoes are very uncomfortable.  I suggested that he try these.  He was originally resistant.  Finally, he was desperate so I ordered these.  He wears them all the time and loves them.  So glad I was able to convince him to try them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020

Title: Soo nicee
Review: I love crocs! The only weird part was it was open, but luckily nothing missing. I forgot how weird new ones feel at first but break in sooo nicely and they're so comfy. I put a pic of my current crocs with the new ones. So cute and love, I got a pair of tyedye ones  for my mom.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020

Title: My favorites for life!
Review: Someone gave me a 1 pair. I noticed my feet weren’t hurting like they normally do. I liked them so much, I bought 2 more.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020

Title: Comfortable "slippers" for a great price
Review: I use these to mainly travel to and from my basement. My previous slippers did not have heel support; on more than one occasion I was afraid that I was going to fall down the stairs. These crocs fit perfect, are more comfortable than I expected, and do not slip at all!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020

Title: Helps my foot pain
Review: My diabetic feet are painful and I needed something cushy to wear around the house.  These are nice!  I wear them with my bamboo socks and they have helped with easing the agony.  Not sure I would wear without my socks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020

Title: always great shoes
Review: I've been wearing Crocs for many years and have tried several styles.  The Classic is still my favorite for comfort.  Some styles used to come in a Wide, and don't any more, but this one fit fine anyway, and I have a wide instep.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020

Title: I like these shoes
Review: I like these shoes, got these for myself and a black pair for my husband. For both of us they are a bit large so I would say go down about half a size. We like wearing them after a shower at the gym (where flip flops for the shower) to air out or feet. Sometimes we where them at home however, they attract dog hair like nobody's business. There are people who have videos and instructions on how to remove pet hair from your carpet with these things. So on carpet and wood floor they are great for them but that is not my purpose.They feel great so I will keep wearing them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2016

Title: Never knew what I was missing
Review: Omg I never knew I needed crocs til I got crocs. These are perfect for everyday use!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020

Title: My first Crocs!
Review: My first Crocs! I have never worn Crocs because I thought they were the ugliest shoes ever. I still think that, lol.But...I needed shoes I could garden in, shoes that I could clean by washing in the sink when I finished my gardening chores. You can't do that with any other shoe. They're so cheap. And so squishy comfortable.The fit is spot on for me. I wear size nine in most shoes and the Croc 9 is perfect in length. The toe box is super tall and wide, but this doesn't affect comfort or size.Good heavens they're ugly though.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2016

Title: Still Hope Out There For Those Purchasing Crocs
Review: Love Crocs, these are great! They're comfy af (as stated in another review), but I would like to add that you can still get booty while owning Crocs. I'm happily married and my wife actually suggested these to me, but I wouldn't dare wear them WHILE getting booty... she doesn't like it when I track dirt in the house.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019

Title: Great price
Review: I got these on sale which was a great value. I bought these for a girlfriend in her favorite color (very pretty color choices!) and she loved them. They are a little uncomfortable to stand/walk in all day long, though
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020

Title: Wonderful Comfort
Review: Amazing slippers! Also can be shoes of course. These were a gift for my husband and he LOVES them. He has a terrible time with foot pain and trying to get comfortable in other casual shoes; these did the trick. We plan to order more.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020

Title: Crocin’
Review: They are very light weight and comfortable. They fit perhaps a half size large as they have no in between or half sizes; however, there is plenty of room for wearing socks with them. I am happy with them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020

Title: Don't ever leave in direct sun exposure, they will deform and no longer fit properly.
Review: I have owned more pairs than I can recall. Great shoe for some uses. Easy on/off in bare feet or socks. Horrible for water use, very unstable. Left in direct sunlight, they will deform and become unwearable. I'll buy another pair.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

Title: I love the blue
Review: Not true to size. I've been wearing Crocs for somewhere around 20 years. I love them. I don't know why these weren't the same as the others I bought. Because the other ones we're true to size and they were Croc brand
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020

Title: outstanding shoes
Review: if your a size 9 for men and you want a perfect fit order 10m 12w.9 for me is a little to tight and no room,a 10m is perfect.i love crocs,i need to ware something on my feet for around the house I could not find anything for this need,crocs is the perfect find,i ware these all day and night for home use.i will buy again in the future,for the value and how well they make these you cannot fail.plese crocs keep making these shoes.thanks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018

Title: Great Fit & Design! Very Satisfied!
Review: I am so happy to find a cute pair of Crocs that will go with my jeans and any top I might wear with them. What I am most excited about, is these crocs fit my feet very well. In the last year or two I've had problems with the new sizing for Crocs (purchased directly) and have had to return or giveaway or not wear four pairs. So I took a chance on ordering  this pair  and I was thrilled that they fit and they look really cute. I normally wear a size woman's nine which is what I ordered.  I am so pleased that I am going to order another pair just like them so I expect to be set for a number of years! One additional note, I have diabetic nerve damage and Crocs are the most comfortable shoes for my feet, in addition they keep my feet protected and provide additional stability for walking.  I couldn't be more pleased to have found this new design and one that fits so perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016

Title: Comfortable
Review: Love these crocs! Super comfy for work. I’m on my feet all day and these are great! Color is great too!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020

Title: Love these super comfortable CROCS.👍
Review: My daughter & grandajghters have worn these for "years", but I was reluctant because of the ribbing on the inside and I thought they were plastic-----WELL, let me say I was so wrong.  These are the most comfortable shoes I have worn, except for my berkies ( but they take time to start fitting  right ). But these fit immediately AND my daughter said that she throws hers in  with clothes in the washer.  How nice ! I love these and they arrived on time.  So, what's not to like ?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2017

Title: Extremely comfortable for hammertoe
Review: I have hammertoe on my right foot and have difficulty finding a comfortable pair of closed toe shoes. I stand on my feet for long hours as well so even wider toebox shoes chafe my toe and cause a lot of pain. To make it easy on myself I just stuck with one pair of walking shoes and never tried another one. Through the recommendation of a friend who has multiple foot issues I decided to give crocs a try.  I couldnt be more glad that I bought these shoes. The size is perfect and i wear them and work in my studio for hours standing without ever being reminded of my pain. These shoes are extremely comfortable and I wear them all the time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2019

Title: Great product!
Review: My son has worn the same pair of Crocs forever. He wanted another pair because of how easy they are to get on and with baseball he needs something to wear to the field before putting on his spikes. These work so well and he has been super happy since getting his new pair!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020

Title: Most comfortable Croc!  There is a BIG difference!
Review: I love the Cayman croc.  They look the same as the regular croc but are much softer and comfortable.  The difference is amazing!  Of course, they still don't last more than a few months before the soles are smooth and slippery.  But they are so comfortable to wear!  At least until you slip and fall and break your body!  If the soles lasted longer, I would give them 10 stars!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019

Title: Crocs year-round
Review: I live in my crocks, even in winter inside the house. I put my warm aloe infused ankle socks under them in winter. They are more supportive than bedroom slippers which I used to wear around the house all the time. I love finding them on sale, especially finding my new pink crocs for approximately $10 on amazon!!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019

Title: My new favorite shoes
Review: I don’t know why I waited so many years to buy my first pair of crocs! My 1 year old granddaughter has a pair so I bought a matching pair.I love these crocs! I have a very wide foot, and this is the first pair of shoes I’ve ever owned that have plenty of room in the toe box.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020

Title: Great to get dirty
Review: I love the Crocs, I use them to cut the grass, they are comfortable, and can get as dirty as you need to get and just wash and rinse them off.  A great project shoe to wear when you need something that won't get ruined by mud, water, or getting dirty.  Everyone needs to own a pair of Crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019

Title: Perfect for injury and wood floors
Review: It was suggested that I try Crocs after falling and injuring my ankle. Regular shoes hurt because of where they hit in the back of my ankle so I ordered some to give them a try. I ordered a size 8 and they fit well.  Arch support is there and they are open in the back so I actually walk more comfortably with them on.  I have also discovered that they are very comfortable on wood floors.  I have only worn them inside partly because because it's winter but really because they are kind of ugly. Think I'll keep them as "inside shoes".
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2019

Title: Comfy but not for running
Review: My daughter loves these! We got a bright yellow which is her favorite color and I live that there are so many colors to choose from. She feels very comfortable in them and wears them everywhere. The only problem is that she occasionally tries to run in them and often trips. They are just not made for running.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2019

Title: a great slipper choice!
Review: this is a comfortable footwear.I bought it slightly bigger for a better comfort wearing by 1 size number and it is just nice when I tried out.If buying maybe can consider 0.5 to 1 size bigger if you are looking for a wider design.there is sufficient space for the toes to wriggle and it feels good when wearing the crocs slipper as it does not make the foot painWill consider getting another pair when the croc clog is worn out from the usage.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2018

Title: Great color and very comfortable
Review: I find Crocs clogs so comfortable for anytime when I'm doing a lot of walking.  The only complaint I've had with Crocs is the inconsistency of the sizing.  This time, I was lucky and chose a size larger - thanks to those who reviewed this shoe.  They for perfectly.  I like to wear these with socks for the cold Arizona winters and these will be great.  (I normally wear a size 7.5 shoe and chose the size 8.....a size 7 would've been too small)  I have about 15 pairs of Crocs.....and 4 are the clogs of different. colors.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2016

Title: Love them !!!
Review: Absolutely love crocs ! Especially the bright coloured ones.They are very durable, comfortable, I often stick them in the washing machine, colours never fade.Excellent for running around the house and going to the supermarket
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020

Title: Love them
Review: Ordered these for my husband. He loves them. He wears them outside while doing yard work as they can get dirty and are waterproof so he just washes them off. This is his second pair and as he has large feet his size is sometimes hard to find.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Standard Croc comfort and Quality
Review: Always wider in front which is great for my feet. Since I expected and needed that, they were perfect. Good quality and very comfortable. They don't last me as long as I would like because I wear them a lot but cute shoes and great for gardening or slipping on for running errands and such. Bright colors makes them fun to wear.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019

Title: Awesome shoes!
Review: I got my son a pair of toddler crocs for summer... my husband and I were instantly jealous when I saw how comfortable they were. We knew we had to buy a few pairs. Love them! So easy to slip on and clean. I am now a believer!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020

Title: True to size, comfortable
Review: This is my first pair of Crocs as I've avoided wearing them for a long time. I finally caved and what a fool I was for not getting a pair sooner! They are great to wear around the house, I've only worn them outside for short periods. I highly recommend these shoes. I ordered my normal size 10 and they fit wonderfully. Very comfortable too!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2019

Title: A bit small for my toes, but otherwise perfect!
Review: I really wanted crocs for the longest time, I bought these and love to wear them whenever I'm too lazy to put on sneakers or if I'm just going to grab the mail. I ordered a women's size 9 shoe and it fits relatively well, the only issue is that my toes feel like they're squished against the shoe. Other than that, great product!Ignore the haters, croc's are amazing and you should wear what you love :)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2020

Title: Love the color
Review: First time I’ve ever bought the name brand and maybe they are worth while.  These are the third pair of this style I’ve tried this year and at last  I’m happy with them.Took one star off because they will shrink if left in the car in the sunlight.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2020

Title: They Fit Perfect!
Review: Everyone in my family has been telling me to get a pair of Crocs, so I finally found them on Amazon at the best price and ordered them. Right out of the package, they fit perfect and are so comfortable I almost want to sleep with them on. But I take them off at night and place them right next to my bed so they are ready to go in the morning.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2019

Title: In the larger sizes, go one size down
Review: I got these for my boyfriend and he wears a size 12 shoe, I had to exchange them for a size 11  because the 12 crocs were Way too big. The 11s fit perfect, he has a wide foot so they were perfect for him. I think crocs run wide.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020

Title: Perfect for around the house
Review: I love my crocks, they are so comfortable, I wear them all the time around the house and even out and about when I run my errands, I may get a black pair so I can match everything. I now have the light blue pair.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020

Title: Crocs Footwear Is Definitely Not A Crock
Review: I should have bought a pair of these 10 years ago.  Most comfortable footwear ever.  Perfect if you work in a hospital or hospital like environment. Or, just banging around the house.  Very lightweight, super comfortable & very well made.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2017

Title: Comfortable, washable, great summer and gardening shoes, Run large.
Review: Is quite comfortable once I was able to get the right size.  They run big.  I wear them in the summer with shorts and sundresses.  Also, I wear them in the garden because I don’t have to wear special gardening shoes since they are washable.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020

Title: My first pair of crocs!
Review: These are my first ever pair of crocs. Great arch support, great fit. I would recommend buying a size larger. They don't run big, I just like a big fit. I look forward to buying other colors.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020

Title: Xmas gift for nephew
Review: My nephew asked for theses for a Christmas gift.  He was confused by the sizing and what he readin the reviews.  I ordered two sizes to be sure one fit him.  We chose the smaller size and that was a little bigbut he kept those. They are comfortable, durable shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020

Title: comfortable!
Review: honestly, i never thought i’d wear a pair of crocs in my entire life. i got tired of having to wash my piggy slippers every time i went out to smoke, but i’m in love! i wear them out every time now! i got some cool charms for them too!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020

Title: Great product, it's a shame I waited so long to purchase
Review: The price was great, fit is spot on and they're very comfortable. Just wish I would have made the leap sooner. Problem is they never have my size to try on in store so it was always discouraging to purchase.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020

Title: Not quite the same as older crocs
Review: These just aren't quite the same as the Crocs I've been wearing for years. The material is a bit "harder" and does not have the softness that I'm used to. And the size is slightly smaller. With this pair, I can wear them with the strap moved forward but if I put the strap around my foot, then my toe touches the front of the shoe. In all my other crocs, I've had a comfortably loose fit even when using the strap.My street shoes size is a women's 10. In crocs I wear a Men's 9/Women's 11. I've always worn this size in Crocs, and that's the size these are (I double-checked the sole to make sure).I kept these and am wearing them without the strap but just wanted to let others know that they seem to be making them smaller than they used to.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2013

Title: Great buy! They get used by a rough 11 year old
Review: What a great buy for my little guy! They are durable and live up to there durability. Water, mud, running, jumping.... they have been through it all and are still in great condition. Will definitely buy again when his feet grow out of these
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020

Title: Wonderful
Review: I love these! I have wide feet and they fit well. Crocs didnt have the color I wanted so I got them here. Dont be concerned with the little bumps on the inside, they wear down quickly or wear socks but your gonna love them....
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020

Title: Ify at first...
Review: I like them there comfortable, I was pissed at the shipping needed them yesterday for an outfit didn't come till today at noon that made me very mad other than that I love them will get some more maybe somewhere else with reliable shipping
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020

Title: Wish they made half sizes
Review: I’m a consistent 9.5 in women’s. The 10s were enormous on me. So I went with 9. They are clearly too small. I got to wear in a rocky lake so I would rather not have them big and risk falling off. Disappointed in the sizing
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020

Title: Khaki fits perfectly and Navy is enormous
Review: These are great and so comfortable.  I wear them to walk the dog through the wet grass and I don't slip and my feet stay dry.  I purchased the khaki and they fit perfectly (I wear a 7.5 or 8 shoe and bought the crocs in an 8).I purchased the same crocs in a size 8 in navy and they are enormous.  Can't imagine why there is such a difference between the two colors.  The navy will be returned.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2017

Title: My fiancé finally gave into these and he's loves them
Review: Title says it all. He got the perfect size. Hes a size 9.5 and so he got a 9 in men. He loves them so much. He has really bad and plantar fasciitis and he says they feel incredible. His feet sweat a lot too but with these he said he barely cracked a sweat. Awesome shoes! I love them and he does too. #CrocGang
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020

Title: Why did I ever stop wearing Crocs?
Review: I bought these for yard work, wearing around the house. My goodness, I have missed Crocs so much. I haven't had a pair in maybe 10 years, but I won't be without a pair again. I bought my regular size that I would normally wear.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020

Title: New ones are just like old ones
Review: Needed presentable replacement for very old dark blue, paint-splattered Crocs. The last in new pair, or whatever you call it, is same as in old pair. I’ve bought other Crocs (different clog styles) over the years and they’ve all been made with different lasts —as a result, I have a collection of Crocs that don’t be fit very well. So I’ve just gone back to the original...
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019

Title: Great shoes but not left/right consistent
Review: The curve of the Croc at the instep strap connection was narrower than the right Croc, which results in slight rubbing against my left foot where there's clearance on the right foot. Not a huge deal since I am using these as house shoes and mostly with socks. I would have returned them if I were using as outdoor errand shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020

Title: Crocs have a proven track record
Review: You either love ‘em or you don’t. Very durable and fun to wear year round (except on rainy days). This is my second pair.  The first pair lasted almost 8 years till the back strap broke.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020

Title: I love my Crocs !!!
Review: I knew what size to order because I bought a pair locally, so the ones from amazon fit perfectly. My old ones looked too shabby to wear away from home. I wish you had BEIGE/TAN in my size...UPDATE APRIL 13, 2014:  I just read comments about "made in Mexico" and "made in China" ... interesting. My regular shoe size is 10.5, but the Crocs I bought recently and fit me perfectly are 'women's size 9'.  I just looked at the local-store-Croc and the amazon-crocs -- both were made in Mexico -- I guess 'that's a good thing.'  I looked at my very old & shabby Crocs and they say "BOULDER,COLORADO" and "[...]." I don't know what this means....
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2014

Title: Order down if you’re a half size!
Review: I love Crocs, but they do tend to be a little on the larger side. These were for my boyfriend and he’s a half size, so I ordered up to make sure they fit. They’re very big, almost to the point of sliding off his feet. I definitely should have ordered down. They’re flexible enough that that could have worked.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020

Title: Best thing since sliced bread!
Review: I love my crocs! I wear them everywhere on dry days and even in the shower. I bought one pair in yellow and they were so comfortable I bought another in brown to wear out. The brown ones were different sizing than the yellow ones since the yellow beach ones were size 8-9 and the brown ones size Women's 8M. Both fit fine but the brown ones fit best with thin socks if I wear socks.I have diabetes and liver cirrhosis, both of which cause problems with legs and feet, so I need shoes that are very comfortable and not too tight. Crocs really are perfect. I thought the little bumps in the bottom inside would bother me in bare feet but they don't. They are roomy enough that if my feet swell a bit they still fit. They sort of stick to the soles of my feet (even with socks) so there's no rubbing against my sensitive skin.They are also great in the shower. I don't have to worry about slipping, especially when I use hair conditioner or body wash that is slippery, and I can wash my crocs at the same time I wash me. Fantastic!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2010

Title: All-Terrain Slippers
Review: I originally bought these so that I didn't have to put on socks and shoes just to check the mail (rocky driveway). I had no idea that I would love them as much as I do.Pros:- incredibly comfortable, I could wear them all day- my feet are wide, and they still fit perfectly- there is almost nothing you can do to mess them up, just wash the rubberCons:- when using the heel strap, it is very difficult for me to remove the shoes. I know that this is a feature, as that is the literal purpose of the strap, but sometimes it feels like a bug.These are the most versatile slip-on shoes I've ever owned.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2016

Title: Beware of the Pepper
Review: I have bought a couple of these crocs and love them. However the last ones I bought were the color ‘pepper’ which appear on the picture as black, however they are actually red. I don’t mind them being red but please be aware if you’re planning on purchasing the ‘pepper’ ones.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020

Title: Great, comfortable shoes for the money!
Review: These clogs are homely, but suit my big even more homely feet just fine. Great for schlupping around the house, etc., w/o having to don socks & shoes. I've never liked clogs before because they don't stay on my feet well, the back straps on these keep them well in place. Very comfortable to walk in, I regret it's taken me so long to discover this inexpensive, durable, comfortable footwear. Likely will order another pair just to keep one in the house, another in our travel trailer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2015

Title: perfect comfort
Review: My husband loves these shoes. He has a very hard time finding shoes that he finds comfortable, because his feet aren't standard size and they tend to swell. These are comfortable and he has been wearing them constantly. He also likes that they slip on and off so easily.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020

Title: I used to be a hater ...
Review: For the longest time, I used to make fun of Crocs. Not sure why. Maybe it was my immaturity at the time. But something finally snapped and I decided to give them a try because of the sale Amazon had on them.Now, I’m a convert. If given the choice an option, I end up wearing Crocs. Yeah, they’re not the best looking shoes but I stopped caring about looks. I want comfort and Crocs give the comfort I need.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2018

Title: i love these sm!!!
Review: i used to not think crocs were cute, but i decided to give them a shot. best choice EVER!! they’re literally so comfortable and I got jibbitz to decorate them (some are still coming) but they’re so cute!!! I am a women’s size 6, so that’s what i ordered and they fit SO PERFECTLY. the white is such a nice white color too!! totally recommend!edit: it is now over 3 months later and i’m still wearing them!!2nd edit: about 7/8 months- still wear them a lot!! would def recommend!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2020

Title: I love crocs
Review: The shoes fit me fine,  it was my legs, I have osteoarthritis in both of my legs. And my  therapist told me to get them, but they only made my muscle in my legs hurt more.  So, I turned it into a win instead of a loss, my granddaughter wanted them for her birthday,  And she e my size, so I gave them to her, and she is happy and so am I.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019

Title: Pugly. Worth every penny so far. But im only 6 hours into owning them. =)
Review: My husband got me tie dye socks, so i got these crocks ;) no shame theyre dope. Theyre loose, as i expected. I believe i ordered a size 10, as im typically 9-10. I have wide feet. Theyre so comfy. 4 months after pregnancy none of my shoes fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019

Title: Great
Review: My husband SWORE he would NEVER wear crocs until I bought him a pair. He loves these things now! He has a narrow foot so we did need to go down in size as opposed to a regular pair of shoes for him but other than that, these are great! He loves them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020

Title: Versatile
Review: These were perfect! I love crocs, always have. Very vibrant color, comfortable, and versatile. I work in a pharmacy so they’re a good all day shoe for me. They’re also great to leave by the door when you’re running out to get the mail or walk the dog real quick
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020

Title: Great but get a smaller size
Review: Buy a size smaller than your sneakers. At first I bought my running shoe size and felt it was just too big. Returned and ordered a smaller size. Fits great. Too me years to take the leap but they're comfortable and multi functional.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020

Title: For Ease & Comfort
Review: It's about the ease of donning & doffing and general comfort. It's not about any aesthetic appeal, which it is perhaps not particularly high on. I found my first pair (of the original Crocs--new in box) while dumpster diving several years ago. I brought them home to show my wife just how absurd a pair of shoes can look. For a lark, I tried them on and--what do you know? Those goofy-looking shoes were extremely comfortable! I have worn them near daily ever since. Interestingly, after they started getting popular and appearing on lots of other people's feet, they stopped looking quite so goofy.As much as I like them, they are problematic for some occasions. Little rocks and dirt sometimes get in through the holes; when the soles get worn smooth from use they are extremely slippery on wet sidewalks; goathead stickers and glass can easily pierce through the soft sole and into your previously happy foot; Bare feet can sweat in the summer and slide around a bit; I wear them so much that I get tan spots through the holes, leaving my feet polka-dotted when I remove my shoes.Overall though, for the reasons of ease and comfort, I love 'em.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2013

Title: These are so comfortable. I said that they do not have good ...
Review: These are so comfortable.  I said that they do not have good arch support, but I have an extremely high arch and I don't feel it if it's there.  The shoes are contured and someone with a lesser arch may feel the support.  I can wear them all day w/ or w/out socks.  They are also extremely light-weight and that is a bonus!  I have now purchased a pair for my husband which he loves and wears all day too.  I have also purchased two more as gifts... want to share the comfort!  I definitely recommend and they do not run in 1/2 sized... I am at least an 8.5 and usually a 9 and the 8 fits me perfectly.  Hope this helps.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2015

Title: Bright and comfy!
Review: Bought these for my son. The orange is bright! He loves them. They fit as expected. Crocs tend to be a little wide and have lots of room for the toes. Now that he’s in adult men’s sizes, I can order him his true shoe size and they fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020

Title: Runs big
Review: I love crocs . I normally wear 8.5-9. This 9 was much too big the 8 fits fine even with winter socks. These seem lighter weight than my previous 2 pairs. Comfy for bunions or other foot issues.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020

Title: So happy!! The best price on the color/size I wanted!!
Review: Love my Crocs!! Wanted Navy for a while but didn’t want to pay a full retail price. Thanks for the great pricing. It also delivered so much earlier than the first estimated delivery date. It was unexpected and made me a happy customer!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020

Title: Worth the money!
Review: I purchase the white pair for my daughter and the khaki pair for my husband. They both loved these crocks! I had to go up a 1/2 size because they don’t come in half sizes. But, they fit as expected. Worth the money!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Unbelievably comfortable!
Review: I stayed away from CROCS for over a decade just because of the stigma. But one of the gifts of middle age is you stop giving a shuck about what people think. Now I wish I could go back in time and tell my younger self just how unbelievably comfortable these things are! After I bought these I was so impressed I went out and bought three more pair of different styles. I’m a CROCS brand loyalist now!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2019

Title: Not my fave
Review: I thought I would love crocs,  but have found I’m not a big fan. I personally did not find them comfortable at all. The nubs on the bottom of the shoes hurt to walk on even with socks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020

Title: Love my crocs!
Review: Love these shoes! A friend had told me she bought some off amazon, so I wanted to get myself some! I’m glad I did, love these shoes. I’m just now starting my collection, so I know where to get them at now at a better price.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020

Title: So comfortable!
Review: Probably my fault, as my other pair fits perfectly, as I think that one is more like size 8.5 mens. I ordered the new ones in size 9, not remembering that I don't wear socks with Crocs, so the 8.5 would have been perfect. Next time I order them I will remember this! Other than that, my old pair of Crocs (which I still wear) are holding up extremely well and are super-comfortable. I am impressed!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2017

Title: So comfy!
Review: I love these shoes! I haven't worn them for a long period of time yet but they are comfortable. I am normally about a size 5.5 in women's but it didn't come in that size.
