After reading reviews that said they ran small, I gave the size 6 a try. They would probably be too small if I was actually a 6 but I was hoping they would run small. So far I love them. Although if not wearing socks, my feet do sweat in them and they kind of slip around So socks are a good choice
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2016

Title: Stroke of luck on size!
Review: My husband stated if I buy him crocs to get him a wild color so I got 12W/10M pink lemonade. It was luck that these were the Made in Vietnam crocs that seem to be true to US size.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020

Title: The wife loves it
Review: Bought it for the wife to wear while doing yard work.  She wanted it because it was easy to wear yet provide protection for her toes.  So far she has been very happy with it.  We leave it on the deck so hopeful it lasts.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020

Title: He's a good man and helped me during a time of distress ...
Review: These shoes are made from some strange space age material unknown to mankind before this.  Despite hiking miles upon miles through the Himalayan mountains of Afghanistan for years on end, there is so far no signs of wear.  The tactical nature of the color scheme of this pair in particular will without a doubt protect my feet from being discovered by ISIS-K or the Taliban during my trek through the Afghan arid mountains and beyond. I bought this second pair not to replace my current Crocs but to bless some random Sherpa who needs a solid shoe whom I came across during my travels.  He's a good man and helped me during a time of distress and need, this is the absolute least I could do.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2018

Title: Bought matching ones for all my friends and it was the best idea ever!
Review: How can you not love Crocs?! I bought matching pairs for our entire friend group so we could all wear them and match for our adventures over the weekend. We got them in the Grass Green color just to be obnoxious and we got lots of compliments and comments when we were out and about! The green color is very very bright, but it's just what we wanted. This is the second pair of Crocs I own and I with I owned 100 more pairs in every color they make! (I spent way too much money ordering 6 pairs of Grass Green Crocs so.... Crocs if you'd like to sponsor me.... thanks. You won't be let down.)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019

Title: wear a womens 11
Review: i wear a womans 11 but ordered it in a 12 b/c the 11 was just a tad too short and maybe if i would of worn them around they might of squished out but i was nervous. They are a nice fit and plenty wide!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020

Title: Easy to clean shoes
Review: I bought these for my husband to use while moving irrigation pipes in tall grass fields.  The seeds don't stick to them like they did to his regular shoes.  They can be washed off easily.  The reason for one less star is that he wears a 9 1/2 shoe and these don't come in half sizes so I ordered a size 10 and they are a little large.  But they still work well and he hasn't had a problem with them falling off.  It would be great if Crocs would make half sizes for all.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2018

Title: Pepper Unisex Crocs
Review: I have ordered the Unisex Crocs from Amazon before and this Pepper red one looks just like the tan pair that I have and both were made in Mexico. But this pair is slightly smaller and the arch support does not appear to be the same as in my older pair.  I love the color as it was exactly what I was looking for, but I do think the size it a bit smaller that my old ones.  I can wear these (7w/5m) but would have liked the slightly larger size better.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2015

Title: Good for old folks and people with Kankles.
Review: I think they're ugly as sin..but they're good nonslip shoes for the elderly. When I see kids wearing them I cringe. I think to myself that my 90yr old mom wears them in the shower so she doesn't slip....chuckles....
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020

Title: Comfortable, versatile shoe at great price
Review: This is a great price for crocs. I bought a pair of these when I didn't have comfortable shoes with me while visiting family and they were so great that when I got home I ordered a pair on Amazon for home. They're a comfortable shoe for taking walks, and when I happened to be without lake shoes one day, I used them in the lake when I was swimming with my toddlers. They were excellent lake shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2017

Title: INSUFFICIENT PACKAGING
Review: The packaging was terrible. The shoes arrived in a shipping BAG. I was expecting a BOX. The shoes were deformed upon arrival. I feel the deformation will relax over time and use, but other than that, they're great.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020

Title: Perfect Locker Room Shower Shoe
Review: I use these for changing and showering at my workplace locker room.  I like that there are no exposed pores for biological growth.  Only down side is puddling water, which is fixed by raising your toes and dumping out water.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020

Title: 23 years independent house cleaner
Review: Really glad when crocs came around. On tile a lot in AZ! Not the best for support, But at the end of an 8 hr. day my feet feel best when I am wearing crocs.Be careful when the soles wear down. They get slippery on wet pavement, like a rained upon paved sidewalk.I have to replace mine every 6 months- a year. Of course I am wearing them practically all the time during the day, mostly indoors.Good price for Prime Member. Ordered navy too. Color doesn't matter as much to me, as how my feet feel at the end of the day.However, I do have a pair that is higher end and I use sometimes when going out. Easy to slip in and out of, nice looking, and continued comfort during an evening out. .Been wearing crocs for over 5 years, almost every day.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2013

Title: Great item
Review: I love crocs and it’s perfect. I was hesitant because I like to try them on before buying them but it’s a perfect fit. I love it and use it all the time. Won’t be disappointed.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020

Title: Super comfortable
Review: Probably the ugliest shoes I've ever worn but the most comfortable. I was starting to get hip problems walking on my wood floors so I tried to find something I could wear indoors. I got a lot of recommendations for the Crocs, I figured it wouldn't hurt to give them a shot since I'd be wearing them only inside the house. They were so comfortable I've been wearing them outside while walking the dogs and to the grocery store. I definitely wouldn't wear them for anything besides that though lol.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017

Title: They're perfect for what I needed them for.
Review: These work for exactly what I needed! I bought them for a camping trip and loved the fact that I could just rinse them off when they got dirty! I've worn them since around the house when I just wanted to throw something on.  I even wore them to the movies...not exactly the most stylish shoes, but they're comfortable!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2019

Title: Nice but too big
Review: I bought these for my daughter who wears a size 8 and they are a little big and floppy. She’s still wearing them but she loves them so she’s keeping them I just wish I’d a gotten a size 7 instead of 8 because those would have fit so much better
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2020

Title: Super cute Crocs
Review: I have a different pair from the classic Crocs and they are really comfortable these ones have little bumps in the sole so if you're not used to them they can be uncomfortable if you have sensitive feet. I love the color was true to the picture. Definitely worth the money.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020

Title: Great shoe!
Review: My husband, who's been wearing crocs for years, loves this shoe; he especially likes the little nubs/ridges on the inside of the shoe sole, which keep his feet from slipping around when wet. Previous designs haven't always had that feature.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020

Title: Bought as a gift for a friend
Review: My friend has very large, wide feet for a women. She had purchased a pair of knockoffs at a discount store, same size, and had to return them because her toes bumped/rubbed the front of the shoe. This was not noticed at the store, but she gave them a good workout on carpeting (to protect the shoes in case she did have to return them) at home and found them to be uncomfortable. She gave the Crocs the same workout and was delighted by the fit and comfort. And as a bonus her favorite color is blue. And the knockoffs only came in black. So I gave a great gift, my friend has happy feet, and we had a great birthday party.  It has been several months since her bithday, she wears them every day after work. Still very happy with the Crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2013

Title: comfortable all around clog
Review: These are the best for wearing around the house and outside.  They are much better than regular house slippers. They have great cushioning for the heel and ball of the foot, as long as you aren't walking on rocks. They arch support is good. These are about my fifth pair, and they usually last me a couple years. I don't know what I would do without them. 😉👍
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020

Title: Can't go wrong with Crocs
Review: For wearing around the house or the campsite. Can't go wrong with these super light, well gripping, comfortable Crocs.  I always avoided Crocs because of the look....but finally gave it a go because of my friends recommendation.  No regrets!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020

Title: Fit right and what he wanted
Review: My partner wanted these to slip on when he goes out of the apartment for brief periods, so wanted something to slip on that was inexpensive. Fit as expected and meets his requirements, he would never wear them out, so not a good person to assess their “Crocness”/
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019

Title: True to Size
Review: I wear a women’s size 9 and that’s what I ordered. They are true to size. If you’re between sizes, I’d go up a size rather than down. The quality is great. I ordered the purple color and they are just like the picture. Super comfortable and easy to slip on and off.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020

Title: Nice
Review: Finally it was the right ones. The ones I received are made in Mexico. I don’t know if this means anything but just letting y’all know. The rubber is nice and comfy on my feet and can’t wait to dip em in the lake.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020

Title: Don’t knock them till you try them!
Review: I have to say that I’ve knocked Crocs for a very long time but they’re super comfortable and great for running around town, cleaning, etc. I’d never wear them to work but that’s because I’d be embarrassed, hahaha. They’re great shoes!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020

Title: 4.5 Stars!
Review: I will give these 5 stars bc they are amazing, but I want give 4.5 bc they do run small BUT ONLY BC the band makes it that way. I've always been a women's 9 in the classic fit, but I guess feet grow. I ordered a 9 and the band makes them too small, should have ordered up one size. If you wear them without the heel band than the fit is no issue.Updated a few minutes later: I actually tried on my 6 year old 9 size pair, and they fit perfectly, band or no band. Hmmm.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016

Title: An old favorite
Review: I've lost track of how many pairs of Crocs I've bought for my eleven year old daughter over the years. She has wide feet and these fit her very comfortably. The color is cute without being too obnoxiously bright.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020

Title: Super comfortable!
Review: Great fit! Originally purchased them for my daughter to after softball games and practice. They are so comfortable she wears them all the time. Feet feel supported and they are the perfect width. 10/10 would recommend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020

Title: Very comfortable shoe!
Review: Crocs are great for those of us with foot issues.  They aren’t the prettiest but when your feet hurt you don’t care about fashion. I have owned many pairs of crocs. This style isn’t my favorite (the Mary Jane style is my favorite) but they serve the purpose. I am on my feet all day. In this style I should have ordered an 8 to have room for thick socks. I am keeping them and will wear thin socks. In the Mary Jane style a 7 is fine. I normally wear a 7-71/2. I recommend them if you are looking for comfort.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2018

Title: A little big, but great buy
Review: This was a great deal and cheaper than buying them in store. My first pair of crocs and now I have three, two of which came from amazon. They did seem a little big though, but with the back strap it works fine for me. I usually wear and 11.5 and got these in 11. Still a little big. I wish they had 10.5.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2019

Title: For me the others fit just a little better. But there is absolutely nothing wrong with this ...
Review: Ok to be honest I had never worn this type of shoe and was told each style although doesnt look much different they all fit differently. So, I ordered these and another style/comfort. For me the others fit just a little better. But there is absolutely nothing wrong with this style. I loved the color and the fit was good but others just a little better. I would still order these again at some time. Easy return.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2017

Title: Perfect Fit
Review: I bought these for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. Very speedy delivery too! They are true to size and very comfortable. He wears them hiking, riding, and even to work when it is too hot for boots. All around great product!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020

Title: My husband LOVES these crocs
Review: My husband, who swore to never own a pair of crocs, thinks these are the greatest shoe EVER.  He can quickly slip them on to go outside or run a quick errand.  I ordered the khaki so they would go with pretty much anything.  Overall, he loves the comfort and convenience and I cannot imagine this will be his last pair.  He wears a size 13 and they fit true to size.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2017

Title: Crocs Are the Best
Review: Having been a Crocs purchaser for the last 10 years, I decided to buy a pair for my mother who is 87 years old. She has short, wide feet, and difficulty walking.  She loves these shoes. They are a great width, and so light weight, they are like walking barefoot.  She asked me to buy her a couple more styles.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019

Title: Great Crocs - a bit small
Review: I have had a pair of Crocs that have lasted MANY years.  These were purchased as a replacement.  Listed as the same size as my other ones, but these are smaller than my old ones - a bit shorter and quite a bit narrower.  They still fit, but much tighter so I wish I had bought one size larger.  Still a great product, you just may possibly may want to order a 1/2 or 1 size larger.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2019

Title: Great functional and comfortable shoe for work
Review: No matter the stigma about Crocs, they don’t make a more comfortable shoe. As a big man with size 13-14 shoes depending on the brand, these have been great for work. I spend 13 hours, most of them on my feet, as a nurse, and have yet to come home with my “dogs barking” since wearing these. Yes, I’ve gotten a couple jokes about my styling, but I always counter with how comfortable and functional they are. Also, bedside nurses: when you get some body fluids on your Nikes or leather clogs, you probably can’t just hose them off, eh?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019

Title: Will always love crocs.
Review: Incredibly comfortable, true to size, and easy to slip into. I use them for when I am working around the house but also will bring them to work in the winter when I remove my boots. I am a nurse but I work in a primary care office so this footwear works well. I love crocs and always will.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019

Title: Crocs are back? Maybe they never left. Nice shoes for my kid!
Review: Fit just right for my 12 y/o daughter. Size 6 seemed to be the same as her Nike shoes. Who knew she’d want Crocs, I thought there were no longer a thing, guess I’m wrong. Then she needed to dress them up with shoe jewelry, see photo.😂
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2019

Title: Can't go wrong with Crocs for comfort!!
Review: I got the chambray color for my son's girlfriend. Added some birthday Jibbitz and she loves them! It's a really nice blue color, still somewhat neutral. She has a few pairs of crocs and I do too. Love crocs!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2020

Title: Regular Crocs are a very good casual shoe but sizing can be a challenge.
Review: Although a good shoe, they run large.  In my, case I consistently wear size 12, but with Crocs, I need to order size 11 which is tight but, fortunately, loosens up with time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020

Title: Most versatile shoe ever.
Review: Crocs are surprisingly supportive, light  and versatile. I’ve used them for gardening, swimming, backpacking as a spare shoe for the campsite.  These are bright purple, what could be better?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020

Title: Very Well Made Shoes
Review: My wife loves her Crocs so I bought a pair for working around the house. They are very well made and purposeful shoes. The only minor grip is they rub the tops of my toes a bit after wearing for awhile.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020

Title: Cute, pricey
Review: Never been a fan of crocs but jumped on the wagon when I purchased them for the family. Love the color, they are comfortable. My only issues is that my size is a bit bigger than I would expect so my feet slide a bit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020

Title: She Said, "Nice Crocs"
Review: The minute I got these lime-green Crocs, I put them on and hit the street. I was standing on the corner waiting for the light to change. A woman leaned out of her car window and hollered at me. She said, "Nice Crocs."
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020

Title: My feet LOVE these!
Review: LOVE LOVE LOVEMy hubby says they’re dorky,  but I love them and so do my feet!! Easy to slip on and off. So comfy. Will buy more in different colors. Great for Florida weather.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020

Title: These run small!
Review: I love Crocs and had a pair I had worn out so I bought this pair.  When they arrived I couldn't get my foot in them.  After double checking, the old ones were made in Mexico and these are made in Viet Nam.  The return and reorder was seamless, but if I were to order again I would go up 2 sizes instead one 1.  These pair I ended up with seemed a little more narrow but I'm hoping to stretch them out!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019

Title: Size/Fit varies on certain colors. Love them.
Review: I got the colors white, baby pink, and lavender. The white and pink crocs were just right for my foot. I am usually a size women 8.5 but since there is not 8.5 i sized up to a 9 women. The lavender crocs were also a 9 but they were bigger than the other two pairs. I could still wear the lavender ones with the strap pushed to the back. Love them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020

Title: These run large.
Review: Love the color.  I ordered 12, since that is the size I wear in all other brands.  Wore them this morning first time to walk on the beach and they rubbed blisters on my inner ankles.  I should have ordered a size 11.  Luckily, they fit my husband who normally wears a men’s 12. He’s happy with new navy Crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019

Title: great shoes!
Review: If you don't care about what people think about your fashion sense these are the most comfortable shoes to buy ever. plus when they get dirty you can wear them in the shower or wash them in the sink. as you wear them the rubber will wear down and mold to the shape of your foot which only makes them even more comfortable. a pair will provide about 2-3 years of frequent use before the rubber becomes too thin and you step on a thorn that gets stuck in your foot for about a week.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018

Title: AWESOME SHOES!
Review: I love this product! I have to change shoes often for school and these make it so much easier to go to school and then just slip them off and put my sneakers on for class. Great time saver in the morning in the fact that I do not have to tie shoes and can simply just slip them on and go!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019

Title: Love them
Review: Love the color and the shoe is so comfy!  I see myself buying another pair in a different color. I need my knees replaced and they hurt most of the time. The Crocs help with my knee pain. I can do housework and yard work longer without the pain!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020

Title: Hose off good to go
Review: I like the fact that this company hasn’t messed with this original style. It’s been great from the start and they haven’t changed a thing. Perfect for just about everything. Hose off and good to go.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2020

Title: Super comfortable and the color is true!
Review: My daughter bought these for me as a gift. Intended for outdoor gardening and whatnot in the summer. As soon as I put them on I fell in love with them. I would never have purchased this color for myself. I am so glad she selected it for me because I love the color so much they are fun bright and perfect. I do feel that they are a little pricey but I guess it is expected. I really do like them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2020

Title: Perfect Xmas Gift
Review: I was amazed by the quality, The price was competitive to similar items and what I would consider affordable, I would definitely re-purchase and recommend to others.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020

Title: Perfect for outside & love the COLOR!
Review: I love my crocs! Such a cute color and perfect for the backyard!! Seriously wear them everyday!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020

Title: Crocs forever
Review: I love these shoes. I wear them as house. Great for working in the kitchen and getting chores done. They are incredibly light weight and comfortable. The back strap keeps them in place but they are still super easy on and off. Highly recommend for house shoes or regular shoes. Maybe just not when you’re trying to be too stylish 😉
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019

Title: Amazing. Love them
Review: I got the navy color and I'm so happy I didn't go with the black ones. Great color and quality. Mine are made in Mexico and I'm normally a women's 8-8.5. I got a 9 and I thought the size was a little too big when I first slipped my foot into them but they're perfect. Getting an 8 would have been a mistake. Just enough room with a 9 and stays on your foot with or without sports mode.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020

Title: HAPPY DAUGHTER!
Review: Our daughter just started college and has been wanting yellow Crocs for years! She finally treated herself, as she worked her guts out at a fast food job all summer. So proud of her! She LOVES them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020

Title: Love Them!!
Review: I have always loved crocs but it’s been years since I ordered myself a pair. Ordered this as a late late Mother’s Day gift to myself. I most definitely will be ordering myself another pair in the very near future
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020

Title: Just what she wanted!
Review: My daughter wanted a pair of crocs for Christmas. We got these for her and she couldn’t be happier! The size is accurate (she wears a nine and we ordered her a nine) and she LOVES the color. They were cheaper on Amazon than any of the local shoe stores.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019

Title: Love my Crocs
Review: I love these shoes they are so comfortable. Both of my daughters wear them and I finally got some for myself so glad that I did. I wear them especially for my part time job at a grocery store and they give me great support
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020

Title: Crocs
Review: They're Crocs - what more is there to say? I got these for my son for Christmas, personally I think they are really ugly shoes, but hey, its what he wanted and he likes them. Are they comfy and have good arch support? I seriously doubt it, but like i said....theyre Crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020

Title: Sunshine will shrink them !!!
Review: I’ve had several pair of these as probably many of you have and really enjoy them.. I’ve also worn them fishing many times.While fishing, I took them off and they sat in the hot sunshine. When I put them back on I noticed they had shrunk. Yes the rubber shrunk. No my feet did not grow anymore thanks goodness. A 14 is big enough. This is just a precaution for you fisherman. 😁
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018

Title: Wear them with pride
Review: I don’t care that people think Crocs are ugly. This is my second pair, which I bought because the first pair were practically indestructible as well as being extremely comfortable. The only downside for me is that they can make your feet hot and sweaty if you wear them for too long. You could wear socks with them, but for the love of God, don’t do that out of the house.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018

Title: purple crocs
Review: I use my crocs for runs to the mailbox, taking the dog out and taking the trash out. The bottoms have good traction. Very important to stay upright in old age. I wear them all year long. Can put socks on in cooler weather. I even wear them occasionally for working in the yard.  Love my crocs. The size 6/8 fit my 8 1/2 foot perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2020

Title: Comfortable and Supportive
Review: Absolutely Love These Crocs.  Wish I had purchased them years ago. They are so comfortable, supportive and easy to clean, just rinse off.  Great for shopping, walking, cleaning, etc.  I highly recommend these.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2020

Title: Can't take them off!
Review: These are so comfy and perfect for what I was looking for. They are great inside and they are great to slip on to wear outside! I love that they are almost 2 shoes in one with the strap either up or down in the back. I hope they last forever!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020

Title: For my husband
Review: He needed something to keep at the door for walking the dog in the morning and at night.  We bought the lined ones for cold weather, but these are handy to slip on and off
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020

Title: Oldie  but a goodie
Review: When I finally wore out my last pair of Crocs I didn't want the new ones. I liked the slipper feel and the at home pair of shoes I'd come to depend on. So I did what I always do went to online and sure enough found the exact pair I had before. Fit likr a glove, and no doubt will be with me for another 5 years!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2019

Title: LOVE my crocs for years...don’t judge
Review: they’re great for sports, just running an errand, or to an outdoor pool party. WHATEVER YOU WANT! the colored ones are great and very close to the pictures for anyone wondering (I have friends who ordered colored ones from here) but I personally got black. one thing to be careful about...if you leave them in the sun they might shrink!!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019

Title: Good for around the house
Review: I live with various pets and can't walk around barefoot, so I bought these to be able to move about without having to put on socks and shoes. They wear comfortably, fit true to size and seem like they'll last me for years.Price is good, so I'd buy another pair or two if I needed to.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2019

Title: They're Crocs
Review: They get the job done. Comfortable, slip-on/slip-off. They look like plastic in the picture but the material is more like a stiff foam. My dog loves chewing on them but they're surprisingly resilient to his big sharp teeth. Everyone makes fun of me when I wear them. A+
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020

Title: Comfortable!!!
Review: I always size down with crocs. I normally wear an 11 womens, I purchased a 10 in the classic croc clogs. They fit perfect, even with footie socks. I work in the healthcare field, these offer all day comfort.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020

Title: Great lightweight support as a house shoe. Great summer shoe for kids too.
Review: Great summer shoe for the kids. Too bad our kids’ feet grow so fast, as these are durable. Love a quick wash in the dishwasher gets them clean. For me they offer great lightweight support around the house.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020

Title: My daughter absolutely squealed with joy when she opened them up!
Review: My college daughter asked for “these” yellow Crocs specifically! She even pointed to which item before I ordered. She must have forgotten about them(or thought I wouldn’t get them(because they are just not one my own personal favorite styles), buecause she just about squealed when she opened them up! She LO just loves them, and they were a winner in Christmas Day!!!🤩
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019

Title: Real Crocs, Just right
Review: I love crocs and wear them on the daily. They work well for my flat feet, theyre nice to wear when going somewhere it might be wet, and they provide just enough support to do the few miles worth of walking I do every day going to and from classes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2020

Title: Always buy one size smaller for Crocs range
Review: If you are buying Crocs always buy a size smaller. For example if your size is UK8 then choose the corresponding size for UK7. My regular size for the shoes and footwear I buy are UK9 and followed the same for Crocs. However it was oversized for me. Hence I bought a size smaller and it fit well. Rest the footwear fits and feels good on feet with its lightweight structure.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020

Title: Love my crocs
Review: These are my favorite shoe. They are comfy cute and last for a long time.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020

Title: No blisters
Review: Very comfortable. Some shoes you have to break in but these seem to already have been broken in. Don't worry about blisters either which is something that always happens with new shoes. Not these ones.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2020

Title: Excelentes
Review: Soy 7.5 y los ordene 8 y me quedaron super bien. Me encantan
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2018

Title: exchanged for a smaller size
Review: bought these for my 17 year old daughter who really likes crocs.. she loves them.. so that's what matters!  I think the fit is about right. but it was a little bit different than a different pair of crocs she has.. her black ones that I bought at the store are a womens 8 so I ordered that in the white and they were way to huge.. and bigger than her black ones. so we sent them back and got her the womens size 7 and they fit her perfectly..
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2017

Title: LOVE CLASSIC CROCS!
Review: I am a long time fan of classic crocs....they are SO comfortable, easy to clean, priced reasonably so one can purchase several pairs in various colors and prints!  I wear them everywhere!!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020

Title: Happy customer! Fun shoes - love them!
Review: I wear a women's size 11 M and that is what I ordered. They are roomier as stated in the company's description, but, I like it because I can wear socks with them when I need to. With just my bare feet, I feel they are just fine for my needs. So very comfortable! LOVE the purple. Fast delivery - great service!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019

Title: Recommend!
Review: These shoes are so light weight. They are wonderful. They are comfortable for a 12 hour day. Not too tight. Leaves room for the little bit of swelling at the end of the shift and as song as socks are worn there is no sweat. I would recommend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020

Title: Croc quality, but oversized
Review: Order smaller than you wear normally. I wear a 15w shoe, and my feet were swimming in the size 15 crocs. Could have even tried a size 13 for a real snug fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020

Title: Great shoe and great price.
Review: My wife loved the shoes but they were smaller than she thought they would be. She has other shoes the same size that fit her well. Hated to return them. I gave them 5 stars because they were as advertized. Under normal circumstance, she may have been able to "break them in" by wearing for a while. She has sever neuropathy from chemo and the shoes cannot be tight because of the pain. Amazon was great to work with us with the return.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2017

Title: Enjoying my Crocs
Review: I bought these shoes to be an easy slip-on while I did outside chores.  They are great for that. They are heavy enough that the rocks in the driveway don't bother my feet and they are easy to clean.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020

Title: Very comfy
Review: Great product! My daughter was so jealous of the black pair that I ordered for myself, she just had to have her own pair. White seems to be the color of choice for her age group (6th grade) and not only does she love them, but now she feels included in some way among her peers. Thank you!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2019

Title: Cute lavender color
Review: These run a little big just like Crocs from the store so I ordered accordingly. They fit my daughter perfectly. She wears size 5.5Y or 6Y in Mens and I ordered her a size 5 Mens Crocs and they fit perfectly. Thank you
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2019

Title: As expected, and even surprised
Review: I am not normally a Crocs fan because there is zero arch support, but I needed a pair to accomodate the compression wraps on my feet, which I had to wear for over a month. I ordered up a couple of sizes, thanks to the handy measurement guide provided. They have worked out fabulously, and the price was just right where I was comfortable, considering I won't be wearing them for long. And surprisingly, I've not had any back issues or a flare in my plantar fasciitis, so mabye the arch support is sufficient enough after all. I'm actually considering ordering a pair of the wooly style for the winter!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2015

Title: Would recommend purchasing...
Review: Came as described. Great product. Color was ballerina pink and was exactly what was described. Sizing was 6, what is normally worn, and was a true fit. W
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2019

Title: Crocs cost too much but dang they work!
Review: My kids mock me for wearing them, but I don't care. My last pair lasted 11 years until I made the mistake of leaving them outside on a hot day in the sun. Public Service Announcement: Crocs SHRINK. So you have to replace them. And they are pretty dang expensive, if you ask me. But as long as you don't let them sunbathe they will probably last forever.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2019

Title: More firm than ones bought in the past.
Review: Compared them side by side with exact same style I bought two years ago and about the only difference is the new ones are more firm. I had always liked the cushion of crocs in the past. I guess they are trying to make them last even longer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020

Title: Great purchase
Review: I would highly recommend getting these Crocs for everyday use. They are comfortable and breathable. My only issue with them was that they rubbed the side of my feet a little raw, but granted I was walking in them for 12 hours a day for work. They work as a great leisure shoe.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020

Title: Fit my wide feet and were very comfortable.
Review: I had always thought Crocs were rather unattractive shoes and didn't understand how and why people would wear them. Then I retired, bought a power washer, and badly needed some outdoor shoes that could handle the water and still give me the traction to push the mower. (I did NOT want to get my nice athletic shoes all wet and green from the grass.) A shoe store associate directed me to the Croc. I knew the Croc was a wider shoe and only came in whole sizes. So I ordered an 8 even though I wear an 8.5. This shoe fit my wide feet perfectly and was very comfortable. I love, love, love that I don't have to worry about getting dirt, water, soap, grass stains, etc. on these shoes because I can just wash them off with the hose. In the meantime, my athletic shoes stay in pristine condition. THEN, I started wearing the Crocs around the house while cleaning and running up and down the stairs doing laundry. I am even considering wearing them when I run to the grocery store or gym!! Another bonus is that these shoes come in a variety of attractive colors,
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2016

Title: So comfortable and cute!
Review: So comfortable! These crocs are super cute and super fun! They are totally worth it and came quickly. I recommend these!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020

Title: Comfort & Low Maintenance Shoe
Review: I have quite recently fallen in love with Crocs. It first began when taking the kids to their swimming class and needed a shoe to wear that was designed to be low maintenance and water-friendly. This is the perfect shoe for any errand, kid’s class, gardening, you name it.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020

Title: GET REAL CROCS-will save you $ in the end!!
Review: SOOOO happy I got the real crocs again! This summer I went With a cheap brand for using by pool and hot tub! They were awful! Far too small even tho I sized up and foot bed was slippery! Was holding out hoping to find my old crocs that were at least 10 years old but still wore well! Must have lost in a move or left somewhere! Finally have my comfy crocs again! Headed to my hot tub now! Worth the $$!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020

Title: Love my Crocs
Review: Bought 3 pair (2 Lemon and 1 Ballerina Pink) because I LOVE Crocs.  Most comfortable, durable footwear ever!  Bought these colors because for some reason they were on great sales - $15 to $20 off the normal $45 price.  In the past I've only bought Navy and Black and thought I shouldn't buy a product I'm crazy about in colors I normally wouldn't buy -- but I love them.  In my opinion, you can't go wrong with any color.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020

Title: Sizing is off
Review: Sizing is way off on these but I really like the color! Shoe ended up being a half size too small in one color and a half size too big in another color despite ordering the same size in both. Thankfully with crocs i can shrink the too big shoe, but the smaller one will have to be used as a house shoe.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019

Title: Love these!!
Review: So my dog chewed up my old crocs (they were cheap knock offs anyway) so I decided to go w these bc I liked the color. These are awesome. Fit is good. I wear an 8 and bought an 8...they are a little rough on bare feet, but not unbearable. I'm sure to get many many years out of these...as long as I keep the dog away!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2019

Title: #GirlDad
Review: My hubby wore these in the hospital for comfy shoes when we had our baby girl! The nurses loved them! He still wears them around 4 months later. He seems to love them!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020

Title: Great Product
Review: These crocs are perfect for all terrain. They slip on easy and slip off just as easy. Great product for around the house activities. They may feel stiff at first but just like any other shoe they will get less stuff the more you wear.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020

Title: Couldn't be happier.
Review: I wore my last pair of Crocs for about 15 years!  Yes!  That's a really long time.  They finally punctured through the sole when I was stomping around on turf never meant for Crocs.  So finding the very same pair for a mucho cheapo price was just a killa find.  Same Croc, same fit, same ooo-baby-these-are-gonna-last-till-I-croak!  Thank you!  Couldn't be happier.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2018

Title: bought for son
Review: My son needed shower shoes for college.  Didn't want flip-flops.  He chose these and now wont stop wearing them.  He has had foot pain in past - these don't bother his arches or ankles.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020

Title: Super comfy
Review: Bought a pink pair for myself, and then my mom and brother wanted some so I bought them some too and we all love our crocs! They're super comfortable, and I love that they're very easy to clean! We went on vacation and these shoes were so convenient to have with us because we were doing many aquatic activities. Fit true to size.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020

Title: I Hate Crocs - but my Daughter LOVES this.
Review: Crocs are some of the stupidest, most ugly looking shoes ever, but my teen daughter loves them. What do you say, if you are interested - they are light, comfortable, easy to wear - but so, so, so ugly. Enjoy!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020

Title: Most comfortable footwear EVER!
Review: This was my first pair of Crocs.  I’ve had them for 3 weeks and it’s been the last thing I’ve worn since I’ve put them on.  I cannot believe how comfortable these things are.  Seriously my new favorite footwear.  I usually wear a 12.5 but got 13 because of my wide feet.  They’re are true to size and wear a little big but I like that.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019

Title: Surprisingly Comfortable.
Review: Always teased people that wore crocs because...eel they are Crocs 🤷🏼‍♂️As soon as I put these on, they were SOOO comfortable.I won’t wear them outside or in public, but they are my new house shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2020

Title: Garden shoes
Review: Crocs were deep garnet which is what I expected.  If you wear men's 10-11 tennis shoe you will want to order a 9 men's.  Crocs are durable and comfortable with plenty (too much) room at the toe area.  They are a wide shoe.  Suggest trying on at a brick and mortar before attempting to order online
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019

Title: My daughter loves them!
Review: Bought these for my daughter and she loves them! She says they are comfortable and fit perfect. She wears a 9 in tennis shoes and she ordered the same, so they must fit normally. They also shipped fast which was nice.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020

Title: Love Crocs
Review: Honestly still love these as much as I did when I was a kid. I wear these for gardening, on short walks, long drives, grocery stopping. Even wore them during child birth. Most comfortable multipurpose shoes ever!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020

Title: Super Versatile Shoes!
Review: My Husband & I both have a pair of these Crocs and they're so versatile and comfortable! We really love them! Ordered a pair for my elderly Mother and she's delighted with them! So easy to wear and they wash up with water! A great gift for anyone!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019

Title: Easy On/Off When At Home
Review: Feel well-made and strangely comfortable.  Bought for a quick slip-on to fetch mail, take out garbage, run the kids to an appointment.  Appreciate the hinging back-strap.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2020

Title: Good for yard work.
Review: These are the plainest, most basic, low end Crocs I could find (khaki color). I just needed something to wear around the yard and in the chicken coop. I needed something that water, mud, and chicken poop couldn’t mess up. These work perfect. Easy on and easy off. Spray them off with a water hose to clean them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019

Title: Would have never...
Review: I'm officially part of the Croc craze...aside from the plastic spikes which sometimes acts as micro foot massagers, I'm loving them. Definitely will purchase again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020

Title: living my best life with my crocs
Review: i used to be a hater and now i am fully converted. there is no place i will go without my crocs. people around you will probably advise against getting them, your friends will threaten to socially outcast you—but have no fear, these crocs will win them over too. they're squishy, comfortable, breathable, nonslip, AND you can accessorize them with little rubber charms called jibbitz. live your best life in crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020

Title: Awesome around the house
Review: Extremely comfortable and supportive for my foot. I wear them around the house. A thousand times better than regular slippers. They grip the floor. Easy to get on and off. They run a little big.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020

Title: IM A CROC FAN NOW
Review: Well to be honest never got the hype about Crocs. Now I'm obsessed and they are so comfy. I even bought charms for them... you read it right, I even bought charms. A great purchase and well recommended to others.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020

Title: A Gift
Review: Everyone wanted to take them from the Birthday guy. He said the fit was great. I thought they would be cheesy, but the only thing cheesy was the pkg. It came in a sucky bag that hangs open, not even resealable, no slide closure, no handles etc & Crocs deserve better. I just ordered generic slippers & they were immaculately bagged ijs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2018

Title: Crocs -
Review: My husband needed some shoes to slip on when our dog needed to potty or take a stroll in our neighborhood.  It's a task to even find shoes to fit his large feet. I ordered the size he wears and they fit just fine.  Helpful, honest, informed comments are the path to purchases.They are absolutely perfect, not in the beauty sense,  practical was my goal, mission accomplished. It's nice to have his crocs waiting patiently beside mine.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2017

Title: SO HAPPY!
Review: I bought these to relieve sciatica. They are working well and I adore the color!  I have received numerous compliments on them in just about one week of having them. Great purple color!  Love the loose fit, as it does not set off any foot nerve pain.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020

Title: SUPER satisfied
Review: I'd wanted crocs for over a year now, but thought that the price was a bit high. I kept telling myself that if they go under $35 I'd buy a pair. FINALLY, this specific color went under my price limit and I was able to buy them. I was super happy to finally order them. I also ordered croc charms (I was going all in). Since then I have received multiple compliments for my crocs. I just love theeemmmm. They're super comfortable and wish I could wear them everywhere.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020

Title: Best crocs!
Review: My favorite shoes! I ordered my normal size in shoes (womens size 9) It's a great deal for the quality. I wear them almost daily since I got them a couple of months ago and there's only a little noticable wear and tear. I'm coming back here when this pair wears out.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020

Title: Fantastic!
Review: Need to run to the mailbox?  Have a quick trip to the store for milk you need to make?  Want to social distance on your driveway with other neighbors?  Then these are your shoes!  I vowed I'd never own Crocs, but here we are...
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020

Title: Fits wide feet
Review: I’ve been avoiding crocs for years because they are so ugly. But we got my teenage son a pair and I tried them on. I was surprised that they fit my wide feet. And we’re so comfortable. I found a good price on a color I could live with on Amazon. I like these a lot. I see why they are so popular.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2019

Title: Get Crocs while you still can.  They are awesome!
Review: Crocs rock!  Get them while you can, as heard they may stop making them.  They are comfortable, durable, and great especially in the summer as I use them A LOT when going to the lake or the beach.  They are also the perfect shoe to wear when flying as they are so easy to take off for airport screening.  Get them now.  :-)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2019

Title: Daughters love them
Review: This Christmas I bought pair each for my teen twins. I honestly think they are ugly. But my girls love them. Matched a few outfits to go with these bright “big bird” shoes. Well they love them. That’s what matters. The size is perfect.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020

Title: Too big!
Review: I just got these, and they were WAY too big! I normally wear a 14 wide, ordered the 14 men's, and they're just gigantic. I can tell they're going to be comfortable when they fit properly though! Exchanging for a smaller size.UPDATE: I got the exchange pair the very next day! Size 13, and they fit great! Thank you Amazon!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020

Title: Same great shoe, but the size chart has changed
Review: When I first bought these Crocs years ago, I sized up a full size. I bought another pair a few weeks ago, and they fit the same.But these most recent black Crocs seem to fit differently. An 8 seems to be a true 8.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020

Title: Yay!
Review: Omg I was so scared to Oder these because I hate ordering shoes online but after reading a few reviews I went ahead & ordered & im so glad I did. I wear a size 7boys 9women & that’s the size I ordered & they fit just right! Will be ordering more!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020

Title: My girlfriend hates them. They're amazing.
Review: Got these for my girlfriend a while back. she looked at me and said "I'm never going to put those on, they're not allowed in my house." But guess what...they're in her house, and she has at lest 30 minutes of time in them over the last 6 months.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2019

Title: Another for the collection!
Review: I love this color of crocs! I’m a 7 1/2-8 in other shoes, but in crocs I always go with a women’s 7. My toe’s are at the top but not in an uncomfortable way. The 8’s are just too roomy and wide for me to walk around in.Also getting this color for less than 30 bucks is a STEAL!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020

Title: We are Croc Lovers
Review: We love Crocs and having a black pair just makes life easier. They are comfortable to knock around it and the fact that you can wipe them off is the best.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020

Title: So comfortable
Review: I had purchased this in black first when that color was on sale. When i saw the blue marked down, I had to get another pair. I wear them in the house and out. Light weight, airy and comfortable. Very good  product
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020

Title: They are comfortably roomy but stay on my feet fine
Review: I had tried 2 other plastic type clogs and they didn't work well for me at all.  These Crocs do.  They don't push down on the tops of my feet.  They are comfortably roomy but stay on my feet fine.  And they provide some cushioning and support for soles of feet, which I need.  I am very happy with them and will order more when these start to wear out.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2018

Title: More for your money
Review: You really need to try some of these on at a store initially,  to get a sense of what your shoe size will be. Authentic Crocs are great, comfortable and durable. Buying them through this vendor cost about half what we paid for our initial pair at a "shoe boutique". I'd recommend the Crocs and this vendor as a great combination of dependability and quality product.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017

Title: Crocs Rock!
Review: My husband loves how easy and comfortable his crocs are!  What I love even better is that they don't stink - EVER.  He's on his second pair in 4 years and they just don't ever smell.  I used to have to make him throw his summer sandels away regularly especially if he got them wet putting our boat in the lake.  Lake water just does something to sandels and flip flops - they would stink so bad I could smell them from across the room.  Not his Crocs though!  Every weekend in and out of the lake water, worn while mowing the lawn, going for a walk, whatever - and they just don't stink.  These are worth every penny!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2015

Title: Best crocs ever!
Review: Love these crocs, I got the lavender color and there beautiful and they fit perfect. I wear them everywhere I go. Very comfortable, waterproof, and breathable. I would totally buy another if I needed too.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020

Title: Crocs rock my socks.......off
Review: These crocs are the bomb dot com. I wear them to work everyday(I'm a vet tech) and they are amazing. If I get something gross on them, no worries! I just run them under the faucet. They're nice and squishy and my feet feel amazing at the end of the day. They're also damn sexy. Crocs for life baby!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019

Title: Easy on/off
Review: OK, I am an old guy, and could care less that these shoes are not stylish. But--the slide on easily; stay put; slip off smoothly, and are waterproof. No laces. No hassle.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020

Title: Use Size Chart
Review: Size should be determined by the measurements of your foot NOT your shoe size. Typically a 9.5 men’s shoe, but based on the size chart a size 9 Croc & fits perfectly.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020

Title: Just what we expected!
Review: My daughter is a Croc fanatic.  The classic croc is still her favorite.  Lost track of how many different styles and colors she has.  The next color on her list was the orange.  Color is nice and vibrant and the shoe fits just as we expected..PERFECT!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020

Title: I love crocs.
Review: I absolutely love the classic crocs. They are so comfortable to wear, I have owned many pair over the years. Most recently my teenagers have been begging me for a pair. I ordered them each a pair in white. They love them because they are so convenient to wear to swim practice and swim meets. Easy to slip on before going outside to run around. They are easy to wash. They are comfy. I seriously love crocs and so does the rest of my family.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019

Title: Crocs sizes have changed
Review: I guess Crocs has sized down. I usually wear an 8 in Crocs. Put these size 8’s I ordered against my old size 8’s, and they’re much smaller. Had to send back. The size 9’s weren’t available unless a shipping charge, so had to buy from a local store.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020

Title: Great shoes. Pretty color
Review: Never thought I’d like crocs and then I bought this pair for a mudding event to use as a cheap pair of footwear that washes easy and would stay on nicer than flip flops, turns out I like them for every day use.. They were so great i had to get insulated crocs and they are life!! 2 wheel drive or 4 wheel drive, they are still comfortable
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020

Title: Go down one size to fit correctly
Review: I love the shoes but however they are a little bit too big.... I would say if you like your shoes to fit properly go down a size these shoes run a bit big.... However they are very comfortable and look cute.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020

Title: Worth the price
Review: This is worth the price - this is my second pair of Crocs, and I've had two other pairs of the "off" brands to compair to.  My first pair of Crocs lasted 2 years of wearing them EVERYWHERE!!  The Brand X last 6 months for one pair and 9 months for another.  These are well worth the price.  Now, the comfort.  My first pair took me a bit to get used to the 'nubs' on the bottom...I had to wear socks for the first couple of months but with socks or without socks, they were the most comfortable - I took a trip with a Youth Group Geo-caching in San Francisco and if you've ever been geo-caching, you know that you walk and walk and walk - I must have logged over 6 miles in the 3 hours, up hills and down and my feet felt wonderful.  These are great!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2008

Title: Thy shoe is bred for greatness
Review: I use these for work. They are comfortable and water proof. Well not completely but just enough. Surprisingly slip resistant. I love these things. The best shoe I have owned in a while. Since I put them on I haven’t stopped picking them even when I’m not working
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020

Title: Classic Croc
Review: Not the first pair of crocs I've had, so this was exactly what was expected. Just be certain you're ordering the correct pair. This particular pair has the holes around the toes whereas some are completely enclosed. Make sure to order what you prefer.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019

Title: Great buy if you’re into crocs
Review: Bought this for my daughter. I don’t get the croc fashion personally. I have a pair of blue crocs that I use for yard work, but would never wear outside the house. They look well made and she loves them! So to each their own I guess.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019

Title: and I've heard croc's are bad for people with high arches but these shoes are ...
Review: I've got a high arch, and I've heard croc's are bad for people with high arches but these shoes are incredibly comfortable. Most of the pressure on my feet are the heels and the very end up of my foot, and with these shoes my feet feel great all day. I understand where people are coming from now when they say how comfortable they are. Other than that don't expect a fashion statement these shoes are fugly and are specifically comfort and convenience. (Looks good with scrubs, you might want to buy the crocs with a flat top though since most Hospitals won't let you have shoes with holes in them).
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2016

Title: Likable tho the sizing is tricky 1/2 Size Feet
Review: Softer than all the other crocs are the classic crocs. For someone who is a 9 and a half. The 9 was too small and the 10 just a bit too roomy. Go with the size up you in my opinion. The citrus color is a nice yellow tinted slightly green. So like a light chartreuse.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020

Title: Definitely great shoes
Review: I have wide feet and these are awesome! I feel like these are the only shoes I can walk around in all day and not give pain! They fit great and give a bunch of arch support!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020

Title: Amazing my daughters obsessed! Lol
Review: My daughter loves them! I got them for her she wants the colors she loves it and they’re really easy to clean when they get dirty. She’s obsessed and the quality is really nice.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020

Title: Very comfortable and light weight
Review: This is my second pair of Crocs and I love the comfort and easy-to-slip on feature. They also provide good arch support  for me, as I have fairly flat arches.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020

Title: Same comfort as Birkenstocks
Review: These shoes are just as comfortable as my Birkenstocks. My foot measures 10 inches (from the tip of my big toe to the back of my heel) and size 9 Women’s fits perfect.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020

Title: Not just for Hippie's
Review: OK. I'm 61 years old and thought to myself, I'll never wear a pair of those goofy looking shoes. Looks like something an old Hippie would wear. But after seeing so many people over the years wearing them, and not hippies, mind you, I thought, maybe there's something to these things, so I bought a pair. The classics in khaki.Well it seems you can teach an old dog new tricks. I wear them everywhere. These are the most comfortable shoes I believe I've ever owned. So easy to slip on and kick off. And they stay on when your walking.Now I have this sudden urge to go listen to my "The Momma's and Pappa's" LP's.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2013

Title: It is a Croc
Review: Same good quality as the last pair I had.  Still have the last pair but wore down all the tread on the bottom and the nubs inside the shoe.  Time for a new pair.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2020

Title: these crocs are perfect, like no shoes on at all
Review: My old crocs have lasted about 7 years and were starting to look a little ratty, so I decided to get a new pair, exactly the same but a different color.  I just wish there had been more color options available in my size, but that's ok.  For an old hippie who would prefer to go barefoot, these crocs are perfect, like no shoes on at all.  My old ones are still in good shape, so now they are just for around the house, my new ones are my "dress crocs" for going to town!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2016

Title: Love
Review: Who knew I’d ever buy another pair of crocs!! Love these! I am typically a solid 6.5, 7 in tennis shoes so I ordered a 6 after my roommate said they run big. Only thing I would change is posting where they were made as some soles are softer than others depending on if made in China or Vietnam.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020

Title: They're super comfortable. They're the perfect shoes to wear to ...
Review: I bought these shoes for my daughter to wear to the beach and pool!  She loves her Crocs!  The color, size, everything.  They're super comfortable. They're the perfect shoes to wear to an amusement park or water park.  Truthfully, they're not very stylish, but they are very comfortable.  I'm at the point in my life where I choose practicality over style sometimes!  As ugly as these shoes are, I think I'm going to myself a pair for the beach too.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2016

Title: Comfy secure fit!
Review: Comfy! My sister loved them! She is a 6 size, ordered 6 and fits perfectly! They do not slip on wet floor. They are wide fit but you do not feel like your feet is unsecure.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020

Title: Run large and no half sizes
Review: These run a little large, and they don't make 1/2 sizes, that being said they are gardening shoes, or lounge shoes, so having them a little loose isn't a big deal.  They are surprisingly comfortable and I the color was vibrant.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020

Title: If you are a half size, order the next size down. I am 6.5. I ordered a 6 for a perfect fit.
Review: I can't believe I actually have a pair of these odd looking shoes. Trust me. If you garden these are fabulous! I love them.So easy to slide on and off when you are in and out of the house. I think they the most comfortable shoes I have ever put on my feet. I am so glad I bought the "real thing" and did not opt for a less expensive version. Once you put them on you will agree they are worth the extra pennies.I have the white pair. Rather chic I think!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019

Title: PERFECT for 72 MS patient
Review: I purchased these crocs for my mom who is 72 and has been diagnosed with MS since 1972. SHE LOVES them!  She can slip them on herself and she says they feel wonderful on her feet.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020

Title: Love my Crocs
Review: Crocs have been in my shoe collection for years.  This pair was bought for my husband and he has hardly worn any other shoe since he received these.  Loves them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020

Title: Great item
Review: My better half has a foot/calf issue.  He needed the support as his old crocs were worn down.  I was afraid these were some knock off.  They aren't-they are real deal he wears them 24/7.  Good buy, thank you.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020

Title: So comfortable!
Review: I love the comfort of crocs. And can tell the difference when I spend the day on my feet in those vs sneakers. As for the fit, I have narrow feet and crocs run wide on me. I also have to order a size UP from what I usually wear (size 8) because of the way the toe box angles towards the pinky toe. I think it might be because my middle toe is longest and my third is the same length as my first. But knowing that I order correctly and have multiple pairs. My family owns at least 10 pair of crocs!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2020

Title: Runs a little shorter than most
Review: I am a perfect size 8 in most Crocs, but these are a little short and tight in the toes on my left foot, which is actually my shorter foot by almost 1/2 inch. Otherwise, good Croc quality.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020

Title: Crocs
Review: My teen for some reason loves these shoes so I bought her a second pair. Her original pair are actually from The Croc Store so they are a bit over sized. When I bought this pair from Amazon they were true to size so they fit perfectly with no extra foot room although they were the same size as her first pair.  My daughter absolutely loves them and has no issues with them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019

Title: They're Crocs
Review: They're Crocs doing what Crocs do best. Light, comfy, sqishy. They're my go to for keeping in the car and changing out of boots or for running outside for a chore. They're so comfy I forget to change into my boots.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020

Title: Just right!
Review: Even though i loathe these shoes, my boyfriend however, doesn't. He is a 10-10 1/2 and after reading reviews decided to size up, which was a mistake. The 11's were way too large, so we returned at a Crocs store for a 10 which was perfect. I guess depending on your size and width depends on which size to order.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019

Title: Ugly but SO Comfy!
Review: I never thought I'd buy Crocs. They're ugly. But they were recommended by a friend and I love them. I have Plantar Fasciitis and I needed a pair of shoes I could wear everyday without pain. I would recommend Crocs for anyone with Plantar Fasciitis who wants relief from the condition who can't get into the doctor for some reason or another. They provide relief and my feet are not sore by the end of the day.For sizing, the reviews said they run large. I wear a women's size 9 and these size 9 Crocs fit perfectly. Slightly big, but not too big where my foot is sliding around, not tight at all. I wear them all day, and I want another pair just to change up the color.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2017

Title: Great product !!!
Review: Hemmm....this pair of Crocks are a little heavier than what I do have ... because,this is "made in China " and the lighter ones are "made in Mexico "...but please, overall this product is superb ...color , elegance and comfort are high standards... including the best price of the market ,retail and online....Thank you !!!Salute -Dante
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019

Title: Crocs are the Best!
Review: Love my Crocs.  I wear them everywhere now.  Bought them for wear in the boat and around the landing but they are so comfortable.  Make sure to replace them when the bottom wears as they are very slick and you WILL slip on wet surfaces once they wear off the bottom ridges.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2019

Title: Excellent shoe
Review: Good fit, nice look, very lightweight, waterproof but will not keep your feet dry. I appreciate how they protect my toes from bumps. Don't leave them in the bright warm sun - they can shrink!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

Title: Perfect! Order your normal size!
Review: perfect shoes, exactly what i wanted. rubber is extremely soft and comfy which is surprising because typically rubber hurts my skin. very breathable as well. order your normal size! I normally wear a 9 and their 9 fits me perfectly. i wore them outside and accidentally stepped on a large thorn, the shoes completely protected my feet and i didn't feel a thing. super strong and durable, would highly recommend :)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020

Title: Legit Source to purchase crocs!!
Review: I’m a size 9.5 and they fit me pretty big. I went with 9 in mens but I probably could have went 8. I must say the strap definitely makes it have a snug fit. But there just more loose than I expected. I will most likely keep them, they look nice and are wearable.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020

Title: Pay attention to the sizing, otherwise great
Review: Bought a pair of these from another source and sized up to the nearest whole size since I wear a 9 1/2. Wrong move! Fortunately, another family member could use them. Amazon to the rescue again! Ordered the size 9 I needed and got them very quickly. Very happy with the fit and comfort of the correctly sized Crocs. They are now going to put a lot of miles on in my garden.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2016

Title: Love
Review: As someone who wears Crocs primarily, you cannot beat the Classic.  I love the vibrant color and the way they feel.  No problems cleaning.  Great for wearing in the yard or going to the grocery store.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020

Title: Comfortable and fit great
Review: Granddaughter is a CNA and on her feet 8 hours a day, she was getting blisters around her toes and her feet were killing her, so she decided to try these shoes, best thing she did, no more blisters and she says they are comfortable and her feet does not hurt anymore
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2019

Title: Yay
Review: LOVE MY CROCS!! I never liked crocs but they’re becoming so popular recently and I thought I’d try them out. I can’t believe I went years not wearing them lol. These are cheaper than what you can get in the store and they came super quick. Love them
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020

Title: Fit like a glove
Review: I always wore my husband's (size 12) taking the dogs out and tried my nieces (size 8) on once and I was sold! Comfortable and size accurate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020

Title: My son loves RED
Review: We get a bigger size every year since he was 3.  It's his 'go to' shoe...
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020

Title: I used to hate one Crocs....
Review: But then I gave them a try and I am planning on purchasing more soon! Love these! They fit perfectly. Are super comfortable and breathable. Just TRY taking these off of my feet. I am in love!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020

Title: Love them
Review: Love these!!!! I swear by them. Nurse approved! I got the light blue. I’m in love. They’re so comfy and light. I garden in them. Hike in them. Clean. Go to work.  Everything this is my fourth pair
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020

Title: Good Quality but Expensive
Review: My wife wears size 6 or 6-1/2 shoe and the 4 men's - 6 women's fit her fine.  The quality is good, but for such a simple shoe it is expensive and thus the 4 star rating.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020

Title: Must buy
Review: This is my second pair of crocs. The first pair lasted 9 years until the treads on the bottom of the shoe were worn away. I will definitely be buying more colors. Comfortable with great air vents.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020

Title: Nothing beats CROCs
Review: Fits comfortable.  I wear them to work the yard, shopping, and preforming tasking around the house.  Perfect for end of day work shoe replacement.Nothing beats CROCs
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020

Title: Slightly smaller croc classics
Review: If you have classic crocs that you bought 5 years ago you'll find these running smaller than those did. That is, big for shoes, small for crocs. They are a little shorter, a little narrower and especially not as high in the toe box (i.e. lower profile). I wear 8 1/2 wide in standard women's shoes, and 8W, 6M in crocs was always perfect for me before. Now I think I would order a size up next time, even on what Croc bills as a "roomy" fit. Apart from fit they are the crocs we know and love (or hate as the case seems to be), nice bouncy feel, easy to clean, durable and perfect for everything but ballroom dancing.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2015

Title: Fun story: took the Crocs to a sandal maker ...
Review: Went through Europe and the Holy Land on a pair of these.  Only problems experienced were losing the plastic "rivet" the backstrap pivots on and eventually the bottoms become slick and provide no stopping on slick surfaces. Fun story: took the Crocs to a sandal maker inside the Old City of Jerusalem. He studied the broken Croc, surveyed his available repair materials then using a metal rivet provided the needed repair.  He guaranteed another 1,000 miles.  Almost got it,too!Shalomrhp
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018

Title: Good Pricing
Review: I purchased these because they were basically the cheapest of all options available. They're crocs, they fit like Crocs. Super comfy shoes.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2020

Title: Great for Walking Outside on a Dewy Morning
Review: I got the Crocs to use for morning outings with our dog.  Perfect for wet grass.  They are comfortable and they are bright as can be!!  I know they will be with me for a long, long time!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020

Title: Love!!
Review: I have never wore crocs before and my daughter wanted a pair which I bought, and after wearing hers for a bit I purchased my own....absolutely love!!  Comfortable, easy slip on/off and it has turned into my go to.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2020

Title: Every one should own a pair
Review: First ever, owned pair. I love it. It works with the pain in my feet. My nerves in my feet are gone. So i pretty much can not go anywhere without these crocks.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020

Title: Great house shoes
Review: I see why everyone loves these ugly shoes. They are super comfortable, especially for walking around the house. They are great for wide feet as well.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020

Title: Very comfortable... one size smaller next time.
Review: I really didn't think I'd ever own a pair of Crocs let alone write a positive review about them! I bought a pair at my wife's urging because I have some foot problems...achy feet, plantar fasciitis, etc. The Crocs are incredibly comfortable to wear and bring immediate comfort and relief when I wear them. I have them next to my bed and slip them on first thing in the morning. I normally wear a size 13...when I get another pair I will be getting them in a size 12. The 13's are a little long and wide...not a problem, but I think I'll go one size smaller next time (and there WILL be a next time!)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2016

Title: Love these shoes
Review: Granddaughters second pair... loves these shoes...but the strap broke after just one wearing so I returned and will purchase locally in case I have an issue with another pair☹️
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020

Title: Fits perfectly
